  freestar.config = freestar.config || {};

        <div class="grid-container" id="main-content">
                            <div class="grid-x grid-margin-x">
    <div class="small-12 medium-12 large-9 cell">

<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_1" v-pre>
</div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-6"><likes-rating :perfume_id="76532" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></likes-rating></div><div class="cell small-6"><seasons-rating :perfume_id="76532" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></seasons-rating></div><div class="small-12 medium-6 text-center" style="max-height: 50px"><div itemprop="aggregateRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/AggregateRating" itemscope><p class="info-note">Perfume rating&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingValue">3.65</span>&nbsp;out of&nbsp;<span itemprop="bestRating">5</span> with&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingCount" content="1733">1,733</span> votes<meta itemprop="reviewCount" content="328"/></p></div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-12" itemprop="description" v-pre><p><b>Eilish No 2</b> by <b>Billie Eilish</b> is a Woody Floral Musk fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. <b>Eilish No 2</b> was launched in 2022. The nose behind this fragrance is Catherine Selig. Top notes are Bergamot and Apple Blossom; middle notes are Black Pepper, Papyrus and Poppy; base notes are Palo Santo, Ebony and Vanilla. </p><div v-pre class='fragrantica-blockquote'><p>Eilish No.2 "opens with the freshness of Italian bergamot and apple blossom. It flows into a woody, earthy spiciness of papyrus and black pepper with a contrast of wild wet poppy flowers. Base notes of woody palo santo and ebony that are expertly wrapped in a metallic, nuanced veil of skin musk complete the experience", the brand's release said.</p></div><p class="reviewstrigger" style="font-size: smaller; color: #83a6c4">Read about this perfume in other languages: <a href="https://www.fragrantica.de/Parfum/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html" target="_blank"                             <div class="num-votes-sp"><span style="font-size: 0.8rem;">23</span></div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    </div>
                    Musk note not to everyone's taste

</fragram-photos-wrapper><div class="cell small-12"><div class="grid-x grid-padding-y" id="pyramid"><div class="cell"><div style="display: flex; flex-direction: column; justify-content: center; text-align: center; background: white;"><div class="strike-title"><span>Perfume Pyramid</span></div><pyramid-switch :perfume_id="76532"><pyramid-notes title="Main Notes According to Your Votes"></pyramid-notes><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Top Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="top"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.86407633150587; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.75.jpg" style="width: 3.1rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Bergamot-75.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Bergamot</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.7475514178297; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.285.jpg" style="width: 2.55rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Apple-Blossom-285.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Apple Blossom</div></div></div>
</pyramid-level><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Middle Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="middle"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 1; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.158.jpg" style="width: 4.425rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Pepper-158.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Black Pepper</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.96374447969832; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.206.jpg" style="width: 3.725rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Papyrus-206.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Papyrus</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.74136644894489; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.339.jpg" style="width: 2.525rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Poppy-339.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Poppy</div></div></div>
</pyramid-level><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Base Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="base"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 1; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.597.jpg" style="width: 5rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Palo-Santo-597.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Palo Santo</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 1; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.331.jpg" style="width: 4.95rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Ebony-Tree-331.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Ebony</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.73508893593265; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.74.jpg" style="width: 2.5rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Vanilla-74.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Vanilla</div></div></div>
</pyramid-level></pyramid-switch></div></div><div class="cell text-center"><button class="button small" data-open="NotesRatingModal">Vote for Ingredients</button></div></div><notes-rating :perfume_id="76532"></notes-rating></div><div class="cell small-12"><vue-encrypt-postscribe slotid='1d1d01ac125c724af6a565f4c551870f294' slotpayload='{"ct":"MnMzuXiuIdIzyHYGsNwZL\/cM2i78uCOAqU\/IOPv7j1\/gyKlc68s3KOed7W5EJJXpS5ifucxkynwEcNJZglrUKkd6fcK\/y4Z2Y7Fi0\/YiZJGhhlL\/uGFGAxrKQ\/P1OeOxkidSFdl0RFgvGtXCnPjm2lbdYrGgsPv3TiQtgPcPPsMtVRyQDid6zvE8Orj\/QETYXk5TmYQO5TUkqlKkOQf60DEUEhKeCz0\/f0\/kX+nnjULSGq1HUAUKbw9SAd87t0Krz8DaAqF2nkpaesc44fm34uJxewlGS89qC5ySVmGvpRbYGeTxy+JZQdmT4sBg7Aju","iv":"124550fb746a38b231a3532226053817","s":"7e29f3852fe7ced2"}'></vue-encrypt-postscribe></div><div class="cell small-12"><div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-padding-y"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_3 -->

<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_5" v-pre>
</div></div><div class="cell small-12"><ul class="tabs" data-deep-link="true" data-update-history="true" data-deep-link-smudge="true" data-deep-link-smudge-delay="500" data-tabs id="deeplinked-tabs"><li class="tabs-title is-active"><a href="#all-reviews" aria-selected="true"><svg class="menu" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 20 20" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M10 18a8 8 0 100-16 8 8 0 000 16zm1-12a1 1 0 10-2 0v4a1 1 0 00.293.707l2.828 2.829a1 1 0 101.415-1.415L11 9.586V6z"clip-rule="evenodd"></path></svg>All reviews by date</a></li><li class="tabs-title"><a href="#popular-positive-reviews"><svg class="menu hide-for-medium" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;"></like><span class="show-for-medium">Positive Reviews</span></a></li><li class="tabs-title"><a href="#popular-negative-reviews"><svg class="menu hide-for-medium" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M7 8h10M7 12h4m1 8l-4-4H5a2 2 0 01-2-2V6a2 2 0 012-2h14a2 2 0 012 2v8a2 2 0 01-2 2h-3l-4 4z"></path></svg><dislike style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;"></dislike><span class="show-for-medium">Negative Reviews</span></a></li><li class="tabs-title"><a href="#search-reviews"><svg class="menu hide-for-medium" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M7 8h10M7 12h4m1 8l-4-4H5a2 2 0 01-2-2V6a2 2 0 012-2h14a2 2 0 012 2v8a2 2 0 01-2 2h-3l-4 4z"></path></svg><i class="fas fa-search"></i><span class="show-for-medium">Search</span></a></li></ul><reviews-wrapper><div class="tabs-content" data-tabs-content="deeplinked-tabs"><div class="tabs-panel is-active" id="all-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>All Reviews By Date</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
        <div class="cell destinationreview"></div>                    <div id="parent2372440" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2372440" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="puppyteeth"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2332555"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2332555.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="puppyteeth" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2372440ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2372440" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2332555">puppyteeth</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-12-05"></span><fromunixtime unixtime="1733461386" class="vote-button-legend"></fromunixtime></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I tried this a year ago and just absolutely hated it. It smelt musky and masculine in the worst way. whenever someone sprayed it at work (I work in a beauty shop) you could smell the cloud of where they sprayed and I hated it. <br />
<br />
Well I tried it again todayand to my surprise I actually really enjoyed it. Im not sure if my nose changed or the bottle macerated but I now enjoy it. On my skin it opened with pure smoke, then faded into the peppery, citrus, and sweet notes. To me it smells like walking into a rainforest in the PNW, the damp woods and moss, and making a fire there. <br />
<br />
It makes me feel strong, confident, and lean into my masc side. Just exudes powerful forest nymph.<br />
<br />
The sillage is impressive, I got whiffs of it throughout my entire day of wear as I moved around and my coworkers could smell it on me. Wear time is about average 4-5 hours then fades into a skin scent. <br />
<br />
Im honestly tempted to buy a bottle, its so different from anything else in my collection and its perfect for rainy, wet PNW winters.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="2372440"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=2372440#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2372111" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It smells like a dirty mans sweaty underwear. Its sensual, headache inducing and does have an oud scent. I would hate to smell this on a beautiful women. It smells like rich dirty men.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="2367459"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=2367459#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2367179" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2042028">mrsaturn</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-12-01">12/01/24 09:44</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I treat myself to 2 full size fragrances once a year and I got the 3.4oz for $45 USD and I have to say I love this smell and it will be my go to all winter long. I blind bought it (not usually a smart move) but to me this was worth it. Its very unisex and I can see it being used by men or women. I want to try Billie's other perfumes in her line up. I feel bad every time I use it because I feel like I'm groping the bottle LOL.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="2367179"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=2367179#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2366351" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; <div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_6" v-pre>
</div></div><div id="parent2366066" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2366066" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Spixxy"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2291546"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2291546.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Spixxy" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Martin-Margiela/Matcha-Meditation-64805.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.64805.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Matcha Meditation"title="Matcha Meditation"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2366066ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2366066" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2291546">Spixxy</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-30">11/30/24 09:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Not really getting palo santo. More of a soft oud fragrance. Actually quite nice. I often find oud too overpowering heavy on the leather and leaning animalac but this is musky and light more woodsy and a teeny bit floral. Like a gentle Tom ford instead of being whacked in the face with an olfactory explosion. More masculine but definitely unisex</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="2366066"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=2366066#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2365367" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2365367" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Gabburrito"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2335769"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2335769.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Gabburrito" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2365367ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2365367" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2335769">Gabburrito</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-29">11/29/24 15:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I didnt think I was going to be a fan, initial spray very citrusy then it goes into more of a peppery pine type scent. This is the most unisex scent Ive ever smelled. I could see a woman or a man wearing it even though it does lean more masculine. Smells very woodsy for sure, again more like pine than anything. But it smells more authentic pine, not syrupy pine sol pine. Im more in favor of powdery floral vanilla scents. So I wouldnt buy a bottle of this for myself. I like it, its just no what I wear. But I could see myself buying it for my partner.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="2365367"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=2365367#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2364688" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2364688" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="fluffydeathkitty"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1096198"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1096198.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="fluffydeathkitty" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Coty/Ex-cla-ma-tion-4353.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.4353.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Ex'cla-ma'tion"title="Ex'cla-ma'tion"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2364688ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2364688" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1096198">fluffydeathkitty</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-29">11/29/24 02:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I don't think I ever bought a celebrity perfume before but after trying this in store, I just had to buy a mini bottle. It's such a beautiful, cosy, milky woody scent. I've been looking for a new winter perfume and I found it. Yes, it certainly has a masculine side to it and I think I'd like it just as much on a guy as I do on myself. But the gentle combination of lactonic, vanilla and floral notes calm it down soon after applying and most of the testosterone evaporates from it :)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="2364688"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=2364688#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2362033" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="2362033"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=2362033#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2361459" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2361459" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="red-meteorite"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1328573"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1328573.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="red-meteorite" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2361459ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2361459" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1328573">red-meteorite</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-25">11/25/24 23:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This was a love at first sniff for me when I tried it at the store. Very masculine heavily spiced bergamot with black pepper in the opening, it dried down to a pleasant unisex ebony wood and Palo santo scent. I kept coming back to the store and trying it on my skin three times before actually buying it and each time I wanted it more and more. BUT, when I finally bought it and sprayed it on myself it just smelled like burned wood and pickles  I'm so disappointed. What I got in my bottle smells nothing like the tester at the store. I'm not sure if I got a bad batch, or I should let it macerate for a while... The ebony wood note (which is my favourite note in fragrances) was very prominent in the tester, but I'm not getting any at all in my bottle, just burned palo Santo stick that was soaked in pickle juice. The only "good" thing about it is that it has horrible longevity. I can barely smell it  after half an hour, unlike the tester at the store that stayed on my skin for many hours. I also sprayed it on a blotter and I could still smell it for a couple of days after. So I'm really confused. Maybe my bottle wasn't stored properly and went bad </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="2361459"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=2361459#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2360571" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2360293" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="jdb_"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1843724"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1843724.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="jdb_" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2360293ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2360293" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1843724">jdb_</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-24">11/24/24 19:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I loved this upon first smell, but as my bottle has sat over the past year some notes have amplified and now I get a celery-like scent that Im not crazy about. The black pepper has also increased.. I still get the yummy smokiness, but the slight lunchbox aroma has me questioning keeping her for the long haul.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="2360293"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=2360293#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2359570" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2359570" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="tenderbandit"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2334640"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2334640.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="tenderbandit" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2359570ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2359570" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2334640">tenderbandit</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-24">11/24/24 05:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Tempted to make this one my signature scent... what a wonderful fragrance - smells like million dollars, has a really high end, designer appeal despite being somewhat affordable. It's got some great woody profile - some people say it's got a similar vibe to oud-y and musky smells, but I never had these so I cannot comment on that. It somewhat has a "dirty" smell in a way, something with outdoors associations - but it also smells clean, interesting, alluring and provocative. Do not blind buy this if you don't know if you like woody scents. It lasts long and probably gets mixed up with other fragrances as well - personally it's a great smell if you're a smoker since it blends with the disgusting tobacco smell so here's that!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="2359570"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=2359570#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2358822" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; If you try this and think it's a bit too sweet or you wanted it a little more masc then I suggest bne Fum by Tom Ford instead. Both are like wearing the smell of smoky wood chips. Seriously good</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="2358822"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=2358822#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2358575" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2358575" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Melissahannah"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2333541"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Melissahannah" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2358575ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2358575" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2333541">Melissahannah</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-23">11/23/24 07:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Absolutely adore this perfume. Cant stand No1 as it's too vanilla and sickly sweet. This is a gorgeous unisex one. The top notes boarder on masculine but it dries down to a very pretty scent. My m signature scent is yellow diamond and I'd say this is similar!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="2358575"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=2358575#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2354874" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2073640">Caleb847</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-25">10/25/24 10:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Oh wait, this is interesting take on a feminine woody note while still maintaining the unisex energy. The Palo Santo added a very good touch unpon the mix between the apple blossom and bergamot. He reminds me a line from Uomo, but i can't put my finger on it-, not to say that it's unoriginal but I'm not sure if this is the first time smelling this kind of cologne. I think it's interesting.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="2327303"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=2327303#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2325344" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2325344" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="blkleather_redlace"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1078454"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1078454.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="blkleather_redlace" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Serge-Lutens/Feminite-du-Bois-5749.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.5749.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Feminit du Bois"title="Feminit du Bois"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2325344ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2325344" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1078454">blkleather_redlace</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-23">10/23/24 14:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This doesn't smell unappealing, but it's more like a room spray or a good candle than a fine fragrance.  The smoky wood note is similar to the one used in a lot of Maison Margiela fragrances.  It does bear a resemblance to bne Fum, so I'd definitely say don't pay the inflated price for that one.  TF is taking the pi$$.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="2325344"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=2325344#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2324491" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2324491" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="heirnul"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2041097"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2041097.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="heirnul" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Francis-Kurkdjian/Oud-Silk-Mood-48456.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.48456.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Oud Silk Mood"title="Oud Silk Mood"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2324491ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2324491" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2041097">heirnul</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-22">10/22/24 22:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I really like this one, especially the dry down is clean in a soft non sudsy way that's really nice. I think maybe its the papyrus shining through. <br />
Someone mentioned below there's an sweetness to this that reminds them of marijuana, I'd agree and actually enjoy that in its very faint form here. <br />
<br />
I'd say the apple blossom note lasts much longer and stronger than I expected for something labeled as a top note, but not in a bad way. The pepper is there but doesn't sting, more an added spice. And the vanilla is just a vague creamyness to the woods, perfect for my tastes.<br />
<br />
Unfortunately something about Eilish 02 makes me feel vaugely ill, so I won't be wearing it myself.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="2324491"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=2324491#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2318334" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2316925" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="SuperSueChick"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/43791"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.43791.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="SuperSueChick" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2316925ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2316925" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/43791">SuperSueChick</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-15">10/15/24 16:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>If you like Tom Ford's Santal Blush or Le Labo Santal 33, you're going to appreciate this one for the price!<br />
They smell very, very similar. Definitely Santal.<br />
You can go spray happy, or throw in a suitcase (vs your pricier fragrances) for the price and quality. You're getting your money's worth. <br />
It has good projection, you'll leave a slight trail. longevity not bad for the price, 4-ish hours. Of course depending how much you spray. <br />
Over all a smart buy for a Santal scent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="2316925"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=2316925#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2315920" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Its very unisex and not leaning one way or the other. This scent is complex and its like it cant choose what it wants to be. Its very woody, incensey, but fresh at the same time. Very much a badass perfume when I wear it I feel like Im about to go out to a dive bar to reject ppl who come my way just for fun</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="2315501"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=2315501#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2307706" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2307706" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="joshspencer17"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2049265"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2049265.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="joshspencer17" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Cherry-Baby-95861.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.95861.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Sweet Tooth Cherry Baby"title="Sweet Tooth Cherry Baby"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2307706ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2307706" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2049265">joshspencer17</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-07">10/07/24 07:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I took about a week to decide if I really loved this scent, because upon first impression, I fell head over heels. HARD.<br />
<br />
the minty bergamot opening, along with the apple blossom sweetness, really does surprise you, especially as it begins to give way to a very stunning, sensual woodsy overtone. once the mix of Palo Santo, Papyrus and spicy peppers has you, it does *not* let go. you are truly done for.<br />
<br />
a great-grandchild of Elizabeth Taylor's Passion. a sibling to Ariana Grande's R.E.M., especially it's aromatic/spa qualities. if you like the brightness of that, you'll like the darkness of this. <br />
<br />
I can picture Barbara Stanwyck wearing this in Double Indemnity, just like I can picture the Michael Myers-influenced Corey Cunningham wearing this as well, leather jacket on as he prowls the night in his motorcycle.<br />
<br />
a scent for the witches, the spooks and the ghouls.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="2307706"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=2307706#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2307098" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2307098" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="trinhtattran"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1388169"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1388169.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="trinhtattran" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2307098ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2307098" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1388169">trinhtattran</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-06">10/06/24 14:53</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Unisex with soft subtle scent. The scent is not overpowering at all. Im not sure about sillage though but it wasnt too long lasting for me. It is affordable with $72 for 3 oz.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="2307098"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=2307098#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2304358" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2304358" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="DopamineHunter"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2223378"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2223378.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="DopamineHunter" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Mod-Vanilla-77799.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.77799.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Mod Vanilla"title="Mod Vanilla"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2304358ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2304358" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2223378">DopamineHunter</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-04">10/04/24 03:01</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I already have plenty of sweet perfumes so I wanted to buy this for a change.<br />
<br />
I bought it and at first, I thought it stinked so bad. It was so peppery, so smokey, not what I was used to. I let it sit and it turned into a lovely spicy palo santo. Hot witch, femme fatale vibes.<br />
<br />
Edit: This scent is not for me... I gave it to my 15 year old little brother who LOVES Billie. He's in love with this perfume now.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="2304358"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=2304358#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2303189" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2303189" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="tkkrastev"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2229809"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2229809.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="tkkrastev" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Zimaya/Amber-Is-Great-82728.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.82728.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Amber Is Great"title="Amber Is Great"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2303189ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2303189" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2229809">tkkrastev</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-03">10/03/24 01:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>First of all - give this scent a chance! The first time I made the mistake to smell it just from the cap of the bottle and was kinda put off. But I tried it on skin and it grew on me!<br />
I love Billie Eilish and this feel so much more like her than the first version (I think the first is supposed to be the mass-appealing one... it's a celebrity line aftel all).<br />
<br />
The opening is harsh(er) and it's smoky, peppery and woody. But as it settles becomes more and more appealling. I love that apple-blossomy/ebony/palo santo notes stay alive for hours and on the dry down the scent becomes softer, powdery and intimate.<br />
<br />
It's dark (but on the lighter mysterious side) witchy scent.. appropriate both for the day and night. I feel is more of a fall/winter scent but I can see this working well during chilly summer/spring nights.<br />
<br />
This scent is more on the unique side, it smells niche almost, it's chemical at times, but not in the cheap, more so in a modern way. It is the scent you will get a whiff of during the day especially if you spray some on the clothes. I think people with more of a exquisite nose and taste will appreciate this!<br />
<br />
It's unisex, more on the masculine side but stays amazing on everyone! It smells sexy, passionate and lustful.<br />
I only wished the vanilla note in the base was stronger!<br />
<br />
As for projection, I'd say is more on the intimate/personal space side, which I love.<br />
For longevity, I would say 4-6 hours, more on clothes tho, you smell it on your clothes and pillow the morning after.<br />
<br />
Overall: 8.5/10; Vibes: Witchy, femme fatale, unique florals, peppery opening and truly unisex</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="2303189"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=2303189#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2302276" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2302276" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Lasodine"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1650457"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1650457.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Lasodine" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Sol-de-Janeiro/Cheirosa-62-56062.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.56062.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Cheirosa '62"title="Cheirosa '62"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2302276ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2302276" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1650457">Lasodine</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-02">10/02/24 07:16</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I thought this fragrance would be the average celebrity fragrance, but it was not. I found myself being a huge fan of this. It's similar to no. 1 in my head, but I prefer this version. I have not smelled no. 3. The bergamot is extremely bright, almost like mint. I assume it's the bergamot well-blended with the wood notes to give off that vibe. <br />
<br />
All in all, I would put this in my rotation for a few outfits.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="2302276"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=2302276#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2298749" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It has some similarly to Liam grey (lattafa) and Crystal Noir</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="2298749"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=2298749#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2297289" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2154235">HollyKu</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-27">09/27/24 15:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Im kind of tomboy coded (but love the undignified youthful sweet scents) as an adult woman and this ticks all my sweet boxes while remaining mysterious. When I first smelled it the palo santo was overpowering but now I just smell spicy witch smell. Its a less sophisticated ebene fume in a wonderful way.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="2297289"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=2297289#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2296892" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
