padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1235949">kkaattjjeess</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-27">09/27/24 09:05</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Not something I would buy but quite ballsy (in a good way) for a celebrity scent. Does resemble SJP Stash to some extent as it's similarly spicy and woody, but it's a lot more wearable in my opinion. I much prefer the drydown of this scent, it sweetens up a bit compared to initially.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="2296892"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=2296892#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2293225" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2293225" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="nightshade133"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1760592"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1760592.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="nightshade133" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2293225ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2293225" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1760592">nightshade133</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-24">09/24/24 00:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I smell like a hot witch wandering about in the woods when I'm wearing this. The vibes are off the charts and I feel amazing. Incense, wood, smoke. It's a little spicy too. You do need a certain mood and personality to pull this off. It's not for everyone, and I kind of love it for that reason.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="2293225"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=2293225#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2279290" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2279290" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Lammy"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1941182"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1941182.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Lammy" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Sol-de-Janeiro/SOL-Cheirosa-62-Eau-de-Parfum-60095.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.60095.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="SOL Cheirosa 62 Eau de Parfum"title="SOL Cheirosa 62 Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2279290ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2279290" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1941182">Lammy</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-11">09/11/24 11:36</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Whoa! This is a celebrity fragrance? If you had me sniff this blindly, I would have assumed it was a $300 niche perfume or something way overpriced from Aesop. Its such a high-quality woody, spicy scent, but it doesnt lean too masculine imo. Its beautiful and transports me to a slightly cloudy, piney forest with a babbling brook, breathing in the fresh, natural air. Pleasantly surprised!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="2279290"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=2279290#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2278232" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2278232" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="cinnamorollstef"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1820056"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1820056.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="cinnamorollstef" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lush/Snow-Fairy-58865.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.58865.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Snow Fairy"title="Snow Fairy"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2278232ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2278232" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1820056">cinnamorollstef</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-10">09/10/24 12:36</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I love this fragrance and I cant wait to start wearing it more during the colder months! This is definitely a more unisex scent and I would not say its a safe blind buy. My nose picks up the pepper and woodsy notes the most. Its a very strong fragrance and I find that it lasts all day on me. For the price point, you simply cant beat it </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="2278232"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=2278232#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2271694" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Its definitely more darker than the first one</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="2271248"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=2271248#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2268419" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; <br />
the smoky palo santo notes lasts forever. this works well layered with eilish no 1.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="2268419"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=2268419#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2267240" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2267240" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="fragrantlyenhanced"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1453129"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1453129.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="fragrantlyenhanced" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2267240ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2267240" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1453129">fragrantlyenhanced</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-31">08/31/24 12:34</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>i usually ignore these celeb frags cuz the demographic obviously is teenage girls/boys that scrape the last bit of their allowance to get something with their idol's name on it. but as goes with shopping with a younger sibling her curiosity got me to try it. and holy shit... we both instantly recoiled from just the smell that came from the nozzle alone. and i've smelled some insanely absurd strong fragrances from the 80s that should be classified as chemical weapons. i knew the golden bottle was a horrific scratchy plastic vanilla mess. but i didn't expect this? holy fucking shit. i never had this reaction before. i'm not even over reacting. <br />
<br />
once i finally dared to spray it. this has the exact smell of a saw blade machine cutting thru a metal sheet. and i know that smell all to well from working at a construction site a long time ago. a spot on match. i literally wore protection to not inhale the toxic metal fumes doing that job. this is actually so horrible that i am impressed that such a concoction can even possibly be created in 2022. and that with the name of billie eilish lol?? isn't she supposed be like a cutie baddie girly artist that makes break up songs??? i just find it absurd. who was this meant for??!!! this fragrance is for the masochists that find it fun to whiff on scary smells. and it just wouldn't come off no matter how much i scrubbed. an unrelenting assault of burnt polyester fabrics. please god make it stop...<br />
<br />
no really. this has to be some sort of prank, right? color me impressed. this frightened me so much much that it left me speechless. i'll never forget it.<br />
<br />
metal fume sickness/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="2267240"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=2267240#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2263326" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2263326" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="rose4franc"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1830492"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1830492.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="rose4franc" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2263326ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2263326" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1830492">rose4franc</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-28">08/28/24 01:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Wasn't liking the first one. This isn't much better but it's a different vibe than before. I wouldn't say it's heavily woodsy smelling but that bergamot top note and pepper middle note are what mainly make up the pyramid. Vanilla is the accent base note that's very hard to pick up behind all that zingy-ness. She wanted to market to her bisexual fans but this kind of felt like a Jo Malone or Diptyque sage/wood copycat idk. It's medicinal and herbal.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="2263326"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=2263326#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2258732" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2180603">Adutrix</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-23">08/23/24 14:36</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>i was surprised to find out how close this comes to bentley for men absolute, but with better quality</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="2258732"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=2258732#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2257748" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2257748" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="TripleBee"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1328751"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="TripleBee" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/French-Avenue/Royal-Blend-Nero-99800.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.99800.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Royal Blend Nero"title="Royal Blend Nero"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2257748ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2257748" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1328751">TripleBee</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-22">08/22/24 15:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Scent:<br />
I really like this scent. The scent to me is a powdery, citrus, scent. First off, I really enjoy this scent. It's a fresh scent with powdery aspects to it, which give it the unisex vibes. The scent is pretty much linear to me, it really doesn't evolve on my skin. I just smell the citrus, the powder, which is probably coming from the floral, and some sweetness. Tbh I really don't get what some people are getting. I don't get the woods, the smokiness that some people are getting, the vanilla, nor the "pickle" smell lol. I really wish I got any of those, because the scent on me smells very similar to Bleu De Chanel EDP, which I also own. Anyways, this is definitely one of the best scents I picked up last year. I really like wearing this scent. Both genders can wear this one. <br />
<br />
Performance:<br />
Now, the performance on me is average in all areas, which is not a bad thing btw. When it comes to the projection this pushes off of your skin 6ft for the first 30mins. By the 1hr mark it dials back to an arms length Projection and stays arms length for about 2 more hours, after that it becomes a personal bubble. The sillage is decent for the first 30mins, but dials back at the 1hr mark also. The Longevity is pretty good here, I get about 9hrs.<br />
<br />
Seasons:<br />
This is a summer and spring fragrance to me. Like I stated earlier, I don't get the Woods, the vanilla, nor the smokiness that people are talking about. To me this is a citrus, fresh, powdery scent.<br />
<br />
Final Thoughts:<br />
Overall this is a great scent. I really like that Eilish made it unisex and not exclusively female. One of my best pick-ups of last year.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="2257748"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=2257748#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2255620" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2255620" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="narro629"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1529057"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1529057.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="narro629" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Giardini-Di-Toscana/Blu-Indaco-64760.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.64760.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Blu Indaco"title="Blu Indaco"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2255620ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2255620" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1529057">narro629</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-20">08/20/24 17:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This reminds me of the DNA of Amouage Guidance. Not a dupe but in the same DNA family. It is polarizing. People love it or hate it. I find it unique and has its place in my collection</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="2255620"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=2255620#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2252373" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2252373" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="marianaavilal"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2182719"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2182719.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="marianaavilal" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.50384.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Cloud"title="Cloud"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2252373ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2252373" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2182719">marianaavilal</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-17">08/17/24 11:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I blind bought the set of minis that included Eilish 1 and 2, which are adorable tiny versions of the bottle btw, since Eilish 1 is my signature scent. Eilish 2 I'd never tried before, and it definitely is too masculine leaning for me personally, but it's a very elegant woody fragrance. It's deep and classy, completely different to all other celebrity fragrances I've ever smelled before. Not for those of us who love a sweet perfume, but I'll give it it's flowers for the uniqueness (at this price point, there are plenty of more expensive options with a similar scent profile).</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1440375">layyelisee</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-14">08/14/24 10:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Obsessed with this fragrance! <br />
I didnt care for the original version of this fragrance. It seemed like a basic vanilla, not much depth and a bit pickly. <br />
On the other hand, this fragrance is absolutely beautiful. There is much more depth and the unisex quality of this fragrance makes it smell so luxurious and expensive. It smells like a high end- niche fragrance youd find in Saks 5th. I adore this smell and every fragrance collector should add this to their collection.<br />
<br />
- I dont get christmas tree or forest at all. This smells like a complex woody vanilla. Absolutely beautiful.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="2249042"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=2249042#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2248513" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1636161">zlouiemark</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-10">08/10/24 02:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Its has that damp forest cannabis note. Idk why but it smells like Mancera's Hindu Kush little sister that gets progressively weird.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="2244606"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=2244606#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2240872" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I don't celebrate Christmas, but this certainly smells like Christmas to me. Winter fragrance for sure.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="2240872"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=2240872#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2239964" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2239964" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Robinsonm7"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1738784"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1738784.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Robinsonm7" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2239964ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2239964" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1738784">Robinsonm7</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-05">08/05/24 16:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I love this. It reminds me of a cabin in the woods. Its dark and not cheap smelling. It definitely has a niche vibe to it. Back in the day I had Stash by SJP and it was screechy, almost unwearable, but I could see it being a great fragrance if it were toned down a bit. This is Stash meets Tom Ford. Who can beat this price for what youre getting too! I layer it with the original Billie Eilish. If forest, witchy, Catholic church at night arent your vibes then you wont like this.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="2239964"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=2239964#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2239289" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2239289" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="sootysalters"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1818216"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1818216.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="sootysalters" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2239289ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2239289" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1818216">sootysalters</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-05">08/05/24 02:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>An absolute mess of notes, cant see why anyone would buy this when literally any other masculine fragrance would be better.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2235544" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="freyja0619"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2209692"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2209692.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="freyja0619" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Britney-Spears/Midnight-Fantasy-802.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.802.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Midnight Fantasy"title="Midnight Fantasy"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2235544ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2235544" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2209692">freyja0619</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-01">08/01/24 05:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>this perfume smells like rain after a hot summer day is the best i can describe it, it literally smells like storms and rain in the best way possible <br />
i feel like the bottle matches the moody/gloomy smell so well, people have also said its not worth blind buying but i somewhat disagree as i have blind bought eilish 2 and 3 and theyre so worth it (i also bought them both in 100ml so if i didnt like them i would be done for hahaha) this smell is such an autumn night smell as again it has that gloomy feel <br />
billie did so well making these perfumes theyre all equally as gorgeous</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="2235544"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=2235544#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2235416" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2235416" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="maliciousmal"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1992660"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1992660.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="maliciousmal" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2235416ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2235416" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1992660">maliciousmal</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-01">08/01/24 02:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Encapsulates smokey and earthy elements, while at the same time maintaining a balanced fresh and spicy scent.<br />
Perfectly androgynous, evoking a scene of a foggy cold morning at a certain campsite deep in the forest. The dry down is incense, woody, and powdery. Smells almost like an old textbook. There is a certain herbal undertone to this that I cant place a finger on. <br />
<br />
I did not expect myself to be obsessed with a celebrity perfume but I am certainly getting a full-sized bottle of this.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="2235416"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=2235416#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2227669" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2227669" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Mr_Mitch_Sorrenstein"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2202649"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2202649.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Mr_Mitch_Sorrenstein" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2227669ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2227669" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2202649">Mr_Mitch_Sorrenstein</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-23">07/23/24 23:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells very nice but I still prefer Eilish 1, well see if time changes my opinion.<br />
<br />
I love Eilish 1; it was my signature scent for an entire semester of college. But I had to try this one out because it was unisex and wasnt as feminine as the previous one. It definitely is unisex, albeit leaning masculine in my opinion, but it still has that familiar Eilish DNA to where if you smelled Eilish 1, youd know what Im talking about.<br />
<br />
I really dig the woody, almost smoky and earthy elements to this one. Its a really nice contrast compared to her previously very sweet and delicious Eilish 1.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="2227669"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=2227669#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2225642" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="2222714"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=2222714#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2222090" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2222090" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="veci"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1799321"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="veci" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Bvlgari/Omnia-Coral-14297.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.14297.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Omnia Coral"title="Omnia Coral"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2222090ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2222090" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1799321">veci</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-18">07/18/24 05:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It's actually my husband who uses this fragrance in our household. He calls it "daytime Afgano" as it reminds us both of his favourite, but due to its strength, Black Afgano isn't a super versatile scent. Eilish no.2. is a lighter, more casual iteration of that scent profile better suited for closed spaces and daytime activities.<br />
I think it's an excellent unisex fragrance. The price and longevity are great, it's quite unique and given that it's a celebrity perfume it's one of a kind in that ballpark. I only don't wear it because I associate it so much with my husband that it feels like I'm wearing his clothes when I put this on.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="2222090"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=2222090#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2221796" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2221796" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Luncheonforest"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1779300"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1779300.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Luncheonforest" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Bath-Body-Works/Dahlia-77498.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.77498.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Dahlia"title="Dahlia"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2221796ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2221796" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1779300">Luncheonforest</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-17">07/17/24 19:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I wear this very rarely because it is a strong, peppery, slightly masculine, earthy, woody scent that isn't my typical style. Still like it when I wanna go for something more woody yet fresh! I pair it with a vanilla lotion to make it sweeter. Oddly enough, the apple blossom comes out on my skin pretty strongly, so that's a plus. Not my favorite, but nice once in a blue moon.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="2221796"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=2221796#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2207518" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2207518" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Des96"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1905361"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1905361.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Des96" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.70052.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Eilish"title="Eilish"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2207518ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2207518" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1905361">Des96</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-03">07/03/24 19:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A very interesting celebrity fragrance. Definitely leans more masculine but like one youtuber said this smells like a hot forest witch. Like smells of the forest and like they have been burning palo santo and incense all day and it soaked into their clothes. I put it on my husband yesterday and when I hugged him today I could still smell it pretty strongly in his hair so its definitely the longest lasting and best projector of the three in this collection. Overall its not something Id wear but its a great buy and I do find the scent appealing.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="2207518"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=2207518#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2207215" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2207215" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Irinka. It smells really good. Very woody, smoky, powdery yet fresh.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="2207215"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=2207215#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2206871" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2206871" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="hanavrose"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2179426"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="hanavrose" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Frederic-Malle/Carnal-Flower-1024.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1024.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Carnal Flower"title="Carnal Flower"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2206871ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2206871" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2179426">hanavrose</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-03">07/03/24 07:01</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This and Father Figure by Phlur are the definition of androgynous scents done correctly. This leans more masculine but can be worn by a woman, the woody smell is divine. Affordable price point. No complaints.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="2206871"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=2206871#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2204079" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2204079" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="TDSollog"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/48705"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.48705.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="TDSollog" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Oakcha/Choco-Break-92978.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.92978.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Choco Break"title="Choco Break"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2204079ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2204079" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/48705">TDSollog</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-30">06/30/24 13:10</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>On my skin, this is not like the other celebrity perfumes.. smells more expensive than the $50 I spent on the 3.4 ounce size. <br />
<br />
I recommend wearing this in cool weather. You must like dark woods in your fragrance. If you like sweet, like, airy perfumes, this is not for you. <br />
<br />
If you have Eilish #1, #2 layers well under it. A great offering from a celebrity. No regrets.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="2204079"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=2204079#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2201254" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2201254" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="scvnt"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1916486"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1916486.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="scvnt" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2201254ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2201254" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1916486">scvnt</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-27">06/27/24 13:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I was expecting a masculine fragrance based on the reviews and this delivers, although it is not as overwhelmingly masculine as people have made it out to be. If anything, it is a more palatable Whispered Myths. It is very woody and spicy, but just fruity enough to be unisex. Smells like a hot car, not necessarily in a bad way. I love the little travel-sized bottles and got them mainly for desk decorations.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="2201254"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=2201254#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2192059" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2192059" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="81ghazal1314"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1730853"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="81ghazal1314" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2192059ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2192059" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1730853">81ghazal1314</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-18">06/18/24 10:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is literally Gris Charnel extrait and Black Afganos child with BAs genes running wayy stronger. As a woman you have to love a specific type of scent and have a certain type of style to pull this off since its very masculine. Dark woods and incense is all I get and the sweetness in it isnt a feminine type of sweetness. Its even a little like weed. It starts more peppery than BA but as it calms down in the air u would literally be mistaken for wearing BA. I already have BA so I wouldnt buy this, but this is way more budget friendly specially since they smell literally the same to me lol. Im so surprised that as a mainstream celebrity instead of putting her name on a sweet, hyperfeminine and boring perfume like nearly everyone else shes chosen such almost niche like and challenging perfumes.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; But nonetheless it smells bad... i washed it off after 20 minutes</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="2188901"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=2188901#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2187547" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2187547" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="glassbiome"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1885819"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1885819.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="glassbiome" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Clue-Perfumery/With-the-Candlestick-88206.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.88206.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="With the Candlestick"title="With the Candlestick"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2187547ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2187547" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1885819">glassbiome</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-13">06/13/24 19:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Celebrity fragrances never really interest me no matter how many tries I give them. This is the rare exception. I genuinely love Eilish 1 and 2. I only own a full bottle of 2 as 1 is much more gourmand than I usually like in my daily wears. Eilish 2 is very well blended, long lasting, smooth and projects quite well. It can easily overpower if you spray too much. Definitely a deep, woody, palo santo, and bergamot that leans slightly smoky. The pepper is subtle, just adds the smallest kick that really takes this fragrance up a few levels. There is a creamy vanillic note that ties it all together without become overly sweet or dessert-y like it's counter part (neither of those things are bad.) I find myself reaching for this several times a week. Really an all season though it'll shine in the colder months and under a starry sky. Would highly recommend.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="2187547"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=2187547#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2183415" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2183415" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="stayawake"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1725092"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1725092.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="stayawake" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Stella-McCartney/Stella-Eau-de-Toilette-29947.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.29947.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Stella Eau de Toilette"title="Stella Eau de Toilette"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2183415ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2183415" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1725092">stayawake</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-09">06/09/24 20:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>gorgeous unisex scent. <br />
I always say if I could smell like incense for perfume, I will. <br />
I smelled this in the store, and it smelled like incense. <br />
I love the woody, spicy scents I get with this.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="2183415"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=2183415#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2182680" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2182680" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="_nuenue"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2136969"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2136969.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="_nuenue" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2182680ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2182680" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2136969">_nuenue</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-09">06/09/24 02:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Disclaimer, I only smelled the headnote for a second while testing many other perfumes. But from what I have smelled, I loved it. It is masculine, but so sexy, and still has something feminine about it. It has a somewhat dark vibe though. This perfume reminds me of the big TShirt era of billie, where she dressed quite masculine.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="2182680"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=2182680#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2180035" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; When I first sprayed it I felt like I was hit to my face with the scent and not in a good way. Luckily it toned down after couple hours and turned into more pleasant woody scent. It leans more masculine on my skin so this isn't my cup of tea, but I wouldn't be complaining if my boyfriend used this.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="2177800"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=2177800#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2167655" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
