TF is $230<br />
I picked this up for$50<br />
Not stash or santal. More similar to TF myrrh mystere. But this IS ebene fume. Same sillage, same longevity.<br />
Glad this exists.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="2167655"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=2167655#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2163214" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2163214" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="becca1997"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2025691"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="becca1997" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2163214ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2163214" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2025691">becca1997</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-21">05/21/24 10:34</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a surprisingly complex fragrance for a celebrity perfume that I ended up really enjoying. My skin chemistry tends to make things smell a little spicier on me, and this amplified the black pepper middle note deliciously. It's definitely unisex but it's not too masculine not to enjoy as a feminine person. In my opinion, this is something that can be worn year round, day or night.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="2163214"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=2163214#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2162965" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I sniffed in Macy's and grabbed a cute box set with a large pen spray. I love these woody smells, they are so calming. It's not perfume per se, more like aromatherapy, haha. I love Santal 33 and Stash- so it makes sense. <br />
<br />
Worn properly, I didn't need this. Hahahaha. It got annoying on me, and is the spicier- more masculine one of the bunch. It pulled pine-y on me, even tho I love papyrus.<br />
And well, I have it now. I'm using the pen, and my husband actually wanted to display the bottle on a shelf. I can't name a single Billie Eilish song, but she seems harmless. This was a risky perfume, BRAVO for that. You do you, girl.<br />
<br />
Sillage and longevity about a 6/7, so perfect for me. I would want to wear this lightly.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="2156616"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=2156616#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2151229" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It was very earthy, fresh spicy and had strong mandarin notes. It just wasn't *me* and I don't think it suited my skin. <br />
<br />
I only bought the 30ml travel bottle because I wasn't sure about it, but even after it set on my skin it was still earthy and citrusy. <br />
<br />
I ended up breaking the bottle accidentally and the smell was so overpowering it made me sick. Just too earthy and fresh spicy for me, will stick with Eilish No.1.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="2147976"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=2147976#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2145838" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1560998">ilovejeremyfragrance</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-04">05/04/24 16:05</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>two words: peppery soap<br />
<br />
not my thing but longevity and projection is pretty good</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="2145838"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=2145838#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2144527" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2144527" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="TheJester420"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1955688"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1955688.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="TheJester420" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2144527ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2144527" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1955688">TheJester420</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-03">05/03/24 10:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Extremely earthy, woody and a very light vanilla note on the dye down. Smells very faintly almost like an incense or fresh cut wood in a forest(in a good way). I wouldnt call myself a fan of this being Im not a huge woody lover but I do find this scent to be somewhat pleasant and could be wearable on the right person. Definitely not something I would ever recommend anyone to blind buy as you really need to smell it and have it on to smell the true effects. You definitely could even be consider this a unisex perfume leaning just an inch into the feminine side.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="2144527"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=2144527#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2137777" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2137096" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="pantburk"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1849388"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1849388.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="pantburk" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2137096ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2137096" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1849388">pantburk</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-26">04/26/24 09:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I never thought i would be seriously tempted to buy a celebrity fragrance but after trying a sample of this - here we are. <br />
In short, this is a spicy, woody, almost earthy fragrance with both better longevity and sillage than no.1. Not really picking up much of the florals, just mainly palo santo, papyrus, and wood, with a burst of pepper that lingers faintly. The vanilla is hiding somewhere in the background, but gets more prominent as it dries down, which keeps this from getting too masculine or one-note. I was pleasantly surprised by this as someone who enjoys more unisex scents.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="2137096"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=2137096#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2136339" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1565190">sajtwo</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-23">04/23/24 12:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Once I got over the shock of this smelling nothing like the original Eilish, I grew to thoroughly enjoy it. The palo santo and vanilla notes are most prominent. I enjoy it on its own but mixing it with Clean Reserve Skin creates an alluring combination of sweet musk and wood. It smells like a spa treatment. It's definitely unisex, and I've been loving it in the spring.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="2133983"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=2133983#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2132168" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2118584" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="blackoutangel"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1139624"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1139624.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="blackoutangel" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Britney-Spears/Curious-141.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.141.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Curious"title="Curious"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2118584ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2118584" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.79); align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="2118584"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=2118584#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2117106" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="2117106"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=2117106#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2110675" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2110675" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="archerries"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2057645"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2057645.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="archerries" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2110675ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2110675" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2057645">archerries</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-01">04/01/24 08:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Wildly different from Billie's first perfume. It has a short-lived floral top note that instantly bursts into a woody, peppery scent, with leathery and smoky papyrus. Leans masculine.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="2110675"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=2110675#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2104582" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2104582" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Calatea"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/125612"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.125612.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Calatea" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.76532.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Eilish No 2"title="Eilish No 2"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2104582ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2104582" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/125612">Calatea</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-26">03/26/24 06:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Love it. Smells expensive, palo santo with some flowers, really nice. The bottle is hidious, though. And difficult to use.<br />
EDIT: After some days with this fragrance I see some similarities with Oud Grandeur by Avon</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="2104582"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=2104582#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2102852" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2102852" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="frederickf_"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1378157"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1378157.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="frederickf_" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2102852ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2102852" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1378157">frederickf_</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-24">03/24/24 13:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Set aside that this is a celebrity fragrance, and what you have is a gem thats alluring, mysterious, sophisticated, and deep. Definitely well blended and much more expensive smelling than what youll pay to acquire it 10/10.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="2102852"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=2102852#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2101182" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2101182" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="sassa7"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/114217"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.114217.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="sassa7" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Korres/Black-Sugar-63257.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.63257.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Black Sugar"title="Black Sugar"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2101182ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2101182" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/114217">sassa7</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-22">03/22/24 18:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I'm so drawn to weird and dark scents that the bottle itself made me try it on my arm before I tried anything else. I am not into warm girly cloying caramel or vanilla scents (I d-e-s-p-i-se Flowerbomb &amp; I refrain from Bonbon for reference), so the lack of sugar in this one was a plus. A part of it in all its woody, cold, spicy darkness is reminiscent of BBW's Vanilla Palo Santo due to their common note (unisex heavier version of the sweet &amp; girly 'Snowflakes &amp; Cashmere' in my mind) esp the first 20 mins, which is a nice trait to me, as it smelled familiar and comforting. This attractive combo, vanilla Palo Santo, doesn't fade over time. It is part of its character, a dark vanilla scent in the background without much sugar.  <br />
At the same time the black pepper unleashes its power over a subtle green aroma (Bergamot, apple blossom) that keeps the fragrance "cold", 'dry' and "fresh". To me it's better than the 1st one. I love all woody scents, with the exception of pencil shavings type of sandalwood, which I can tolerate too depending (as in Good Fortune Elixir Intense where I can tolerate it), but the woody notes in Eilish No2 are perfect, nothing bitter, just peppery, a genious combo. This would be the unisex version of my beloved James Bond 007 Eon Productions: black pepper &amp; wood, amazing. <br />
The rest of the composition on me kinda smells like.. tires, not for too long, and it's not burned tires. It's a woody smoke and that would be... the papyrus giving this almost leathery smokiness which I was nor prepared for. This bottle should have come with a warning. The first 30 mins, I felt as if I was at a Love's tire shop sitting next to a tobacco smoking trucker. Not bad at all to me, very different for a celebrity scent and not your typical sexy or feminine fragrance. Iggy's Devil's Advocate is another dark unconventional one, but eventually it gives aftershave on me and dark-haired sexy gym guy vibes due to the patchouli-amber combo (on my skin it translates to cigarettes &amp; sweat). Not the case with Eilish No2. This is not traditionally manly, but not a crowd pleaser which is great. <br />
Someone negatively reviewing the OG Eilish mentioned a vape smell in the original milky-sugary Eilish (the tonka-cacao effect maybe?) which I don't regard as a downside, so I guess we upgraded from vanilla vape there to tobacco-papyrus here. As long as it's not a 420 stench, abundant nowadays everywhere I go and which I loathe with passion, I am pleased! Despite the super smoky effect on me, I went back for it cuz aside from my attraction to boozy, balsamic scents, I loooove crude, cold scents that emulate the various scents of nature, woodworking shops, the forest, of petrichor, musky and herbal. It's like a Demeter fragrance due to the crudeness of it. The reason I like BBW's Vanilla Palo Santo as the wood's smell is darker/colder than it usually is in feminine scents, but tbh the balsamic vanilla there is too much for me, while here there is no heady vanilla (I am prone to nausea). So I like it more than BBW's Vanilla Palo Santo, it combines more elements and its peppery flair is a bonus. Not cloying in hot weather. It is very smoky, but doesn't have the burnt smell of BBW's Wild Sand and It's not as citrusy as Wild Sand, that's a plus. I despise cactus flower, but I detect a similar floral effect in Eilish No 2 accompanying the smokiness, must be the poppy, much better than the obnoxious &amp; sour cactus flower. It is attractive and mysterious, even though its opening was overwhelming. I did not want to shower so that I will keep it longer.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="2101182"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=2101182#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2100368" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2100368" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Decode"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/989262"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.989262.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Decode" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chanel/Chanel-N019-11.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.11.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Chanel N19"title="Chanel N19"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2100368ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2100368" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/989262">Decode</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-22">03/22/24 02:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is so gorgeous. If I want something more unisex and want to smell like I am THE CHOSEN ONE, I grab this. Somehow the smokey, woodiness of this really gives me main character energy. I dont own Elish 1, but this layers really well with Elish #3. #3 felt a bit too fruity (in a way I didn't care for) but this elevates it. I would definitely wear this with an all black long dress with lace, perhaps performing spells under the moon.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="2100368"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=2100368#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2097164" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2097164" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="wrldndr"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1970537"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1970537.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="wrldndr" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Yves-Saint-Laurent/Mon-Paris-38914.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.38914.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Mon Paris"title="Mon Paris"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2097164ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2097164" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1970537">wrldndr</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-19">03/19/24 06:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This smells like a campfire but without the smoke, I am so obsessed with this and have been from the first time I tried it! The best cozy cold weather fragrance by far</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="2097164"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=2097164#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2090639" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Price is soo good for the quality of fragrance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="2090639"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=2090639#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2065780" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1261083">Marxwick</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-17">02/17/24 23:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The opening has a spiciness on top of the smokey papyrus woods. I don't get florals.<br />
The drydown has some semblance of a lighter version of Santal 33.<br />
The projection is great for the first hour, but it dies down relatively quickly.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="2065780"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=2065780#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2065125" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Gives a feeling that you are in a wooden house in a coniferous forest. Rather unusual, but I could not wear it on myself. The scent, although stated to be unisex, is more masculine imo</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="2043461"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=2043461#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2042137" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2042137" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="wildapple230"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1673701"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1673701.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="wildapple230" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-3-87945.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.87945.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Eilish No.3"title="Eilish No.3"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2042137ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2042137" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1673701">wildapple230</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-25">01/25/24 22:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I am honestly afraid to buy this one at first because of many reviews saying it's too masculine. Bought it in decant bottle so that I can try it first, and well surprisingly it's up to my liking than the First Eilish (which was too sweet imo). Eilish No. 2 gives more musky and woody smell, however not too masculine for grown mature ladies to wear daily. This is how I imagine Billie Eilish would smell like if I'm around her. However, I don't smell any vanilla in it like the No. 1. It gives fresh spicy smell from the pepper, and suitable for winter imo. Would love to buy the full size bottle once I finish this decant bottle </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="2042137"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=2042137#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2041143" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Goes well with my vibe, mood and body outfits. Smells like peppery wood forest, absolutely incredible. Just the performance sucks. Theres very little projection, it almost goes skin scent immediately on me after 30 minutes. Sillage is just between weak and moderate. Longevity is around 5-6 hours. padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2035206" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Cielxoo"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1979252"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1979252.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Cielxoo" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2035206ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2035206" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1979252">Cielxoo</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-18">01/18/24 20:31</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I absolutely adore this fragrance. I dont understand the dislike well I guess I do. <br />
This is not your typical girly sweet perfume and this is the complete opposite of her first release. This is Eilishs masculine side for sure. I personally love men cologne and earthy/witchy fragrances.<br />
To me this smells like if you were in a empty church wearing all black with a black veil and as youre leaving the church you can hear your heels hitting the floor, the candles were just burned out and you smell the wet flowers outside <br />
This is definitely a night time or fall/winter fragrance. Definitely not a safe blind and if you do NOT like masculine/earthy perfumes this might not be for you.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="2035206"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=2035206#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2034867" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2034867" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Nahobino"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1856824"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Nahobino" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2034867ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2034867" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1856824">Nahobino</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-18">01/18/24 13:05</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I wanted to love Eilish No. 2 as I love a good woody fragrance, but it wasn't meant to be. I bought Eilish No. 2 on a trip to Florida during Winter break and in cold weather, Eilish No. 2 smells amazing: the bergamot, black pepper, and palo santo truly make for a power thruple. But this power thruple was not made with hot tropical weather in mind. Eilish No. 2 smells awful in hot weather, and I live on a tropical island; hot weather 24/7 and cold weather is but a myth. <br />
<br />
From a gorgeous spicy-woody fragrance in cold weather, Eilish No. 2 turns into a generic, overbearing masculine fragrance in hot weather. Such a disappointment as I actually liked Eilish No. 2 over the og Eilish. But, the og Eilish can handle a bit of heat its way as opposed to Eilish No. 2 withering away like a depressed plant in tropical temperatures of 80 F and higher.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="2034867"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=2034867#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2033229" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2033229" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="thepulptoyourfiction"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1868248"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1868248.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="thepulptoyourfiction" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2033229ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2033229" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1868248">thepulptoyourfiction</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-16">01/16/24 21:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>An androgynous dream! <br />
Similar scent DNA to Santal 33 in the way that some would describe it as pickle-y. <br />
I picture it being worn with an all black leather outfit &amp; a bold lip.<br />
Its edgy and complex, and performs impressively well for a drugstore celebrity fragrance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="2033229"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=2033229#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2033151" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2033151" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="sir reeksalot"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1000324"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1000324.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="sir reeksalot" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lalique/Lalique-Pour-Homme-1844.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1844.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Lalique Pour Homme"title="Lalique Pour Homme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2033151ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2033151" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1000324">sir reeksalot</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-16">01/16/24 19:53</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>smells just like banana republic cordovan except cordovan is pretty good.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="2033151"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=2033151#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2032769" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2032769" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="aandy"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1938251"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1938251.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="aandy" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2032769ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2032769" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1938251">aandy</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-16">01/16/24 12:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Bought this perfume because of really high curiosity. I have to admit that I am not a fan of Billie Eilish's music but her fragrances are definitely really nice. I've read multiple reviews about Eilish no. 2 and decided to give it a try. I tested it in a store in my country and I as surprised by it's scent. A nice woody-peppery opening with a sweet dust covering it. It's a great fragrance for colder days and especially for dates where you want to smell unique and attractive. The perfume is unisex but mostly leaning into the masculine side. It lasts up to 6 hours on skin and it has a moderate sillage. 8.5/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="2032769"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=2032769#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2030009" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; This is bad. I smelled it and pulled away in repulsion</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="2029916"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=2029916#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2028260" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2028260" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="booksandcats457"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1447947"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="booksandcats457" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Guerlain/Shalimar-Eau-de-Parfum-53.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.53.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Shalimar Eau de Parfum"title="Shalimar Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2028260ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2028260" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1447947">booksandcats457</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-11">01/11/24 19:31</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is definitely the most unique celebrity perfume Ive come across. Kudos to Billie Eilish for going out on a limb and coming out with a more daring fragrance than a typical perfume-y sugarbomb. I honestly didnt know what to make of this one at first but it definitely grew on me. Its likea sexy incense scent? Its something I reach for when Im tired of sweet and floral scents. This is great for cold nights and cold dreary days. Also has a sexy edge in my opinion that would make it a great unexpected going out fragrance. Wore this to a bonfire night and it blended with the smoke smell really well. Great lasting power as well. And I prefer the bottle in the gunmetal gray rather than thr gold of Eilish No. 1.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="2028260"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=2028260#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2025393" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2025393" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="amethystfeline"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1965899"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1965899.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="amethystfeline" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2025393ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2025393" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1965899">amethystfeline</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-09">01/09/24 07:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Eilish no. 2. I like the bottle, bite me. This one took a moment for me to appreciate its complexity, but once I got there I was enamored. The top notes are sharp (almost metallic) and juicy citrus, with a firm and ever-present palo santo. If Santal 33 is a leaf of bible paper, Miss Eilish here is a costco-portioned smudge stick. Its a seriously beautiful palo santo scent, which does put it into the more green category of wood scents, like Santal 33, likely due to its spice leaning more fresh and crisp rather than heavy and hot (think thyme versus clove Eilish 2 is far closer to the former.) Unfortunately, I find this scent to have poor staying power, likely due to its freshness, which by its own chemical nature is fleeting. I slashed through half of my 1.7oz bottle in like a month (I liked to sleep in it, very ethereal and dreamy), so that may speak to its longevity. I ordered a gift set for myself to re-up on this.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="2025393"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=2025393#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2024849" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2024849" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="tiger1962"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/425302"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.425302.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="tiger1962" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Phlur/Vanilla-Skin-95817.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.95817.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Vanilla Skin"title="Vanilla Skin"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2024849ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2024849" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/425302">tiger1962</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-08">01/08/24 17:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I sprayed this in Ulta and walked around the store while it settled. Immediately this scent reminds me of a perfume I had in the 1980s by clothing designer Norma Kamali that smelled like church incense. To me this is a very close replica of that. I like it but it a heady strong scent. I prefer Billie Eilishs original scent which is mostly vanilla. Im on the fence about this one. I might buy a travel size of this, not sure - my taste has changed since the 80s</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="2024849"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=2024849#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2024331" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2024331" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Mrs.Sniffington"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1761610"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1761610.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Mrs.Sniffington" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Armaf/Club-de-Nuit-Untold-78476.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.78476.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Club de Nuit Untold"title="Club de Nuit Untold"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2024331ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2024331" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1761610">Mrs.Sniffington</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-08">01/08/24 07:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Despite the large controversy over this perfume, my opinion is unwavering. I found this at my local Ulta a few months back. My initial reaction was intense from the fact that this scent is so unique. The warm peppery smell envelopes your nostrils upon the initial spray (I can see where most women think this may be "too masculine" because of that). As the oils dry down, youre welcomed with a subtly sweet-woody smell, although the pepper does stick. Just a few sprays will last you ALL DAY. One spray each shoulder will have your man following you like a lost puppy. Eilish No.2 has claimed it's homage in my top shelf favorites, and my man's as well. (along with YSL Libre Le Parfum &amp; Black Opium). If your personality is a little edgier and "less feminine", you can definitely pull off this incredible unisex scent. Highly recommend you try it out, as it is a great price even at department stores.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="2024331"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=2024331#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2023466" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I tested it on my skin, sniffed, and recoiled from the repulsive smell!<br />
It was a strange mix of bonfire, burnt rubber and engine oil. Unfortunately the odour lasted for a loong time...<br />
I'm happy that I did'nt blind buy it </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="2023466"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=2023466#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2019425" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/976558">Vyxn</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-03">01/03/24 18:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Sold my Ebene Fume and replaced it with this. The only difference is that EF is crystal clear and sharp from the get go, while this has a slight muzziness that takes maybe 45 mins to an hour to settle. The scents, other than that initial difference in clarity, are identical.<br />
<br />
Update: I've found the real difference here. Ebene fades away after washing and time beautifully. This after washing my clothes has left a really sour, musty tang.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="2019425"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=2019425#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2014211" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1538994">windchime_00</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-27">12/27/23 10:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Beautiful woody scent that lasts 12+ hours, but it may be too masculine for me. The palo santo is very forward which I love. It would be great as a room spray or fragrance oil with sticks. I imagine other people might enjoy the candle, but I don't do candles for safety reasons. Ebene Fume and Leather Skies are good comparisons (though neither would be a dupe).<br />
<br />
Update: It might be less sharply masculine on my skin. Feels more like a temple type, meditative scent. I'm going to keep testing. I love an inexpensive fragrance that doesn't smell too synthetic and this fits!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="2012171"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=2012171#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2011360" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
