It's very smoky and sexy.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="2009804"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=2009804#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2005129" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2005129" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="lucycats"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1455264"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1455264.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="lucycats" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Al-Rehab/Choco-Musk-Eau-de-Parfum-88083.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.88083.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Choco Musk Eau de Parfum"title="Choco Musk Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2005129ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2005129" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1455264">lucycats</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-19">12/19/23 07:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Im a gourmand girl. So I really should NOT like this perfume. But I LOVE it layered with Eilish 1! It creates the most beautiful woody, grown-up vanilla - the same sort of vibe as Vanilla 28 by Kayali (a heavy, sexy vanilla). PLEASE try this layered! That said, I do still enjoy this on its own, its a very comforting and cosy smell to me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="2005129"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=2005129#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1999264" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1999264" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="mugumuguu_aaaa"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1869093"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="mugumuguu_aaaa" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1999264ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1999264" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1869093">mugumuguu_aaaa</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-12">12/12/23 07:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Received my little sample today. Was looking for an affordable perfume that's woody and contemplative in the way that Tam Dao reads on me. Opens with a slightly cold screechiness but it dries down to the vibes of what I call 'Sexy Priest' scents like Sycomore and Encre Noire, which was my favourite genre of scent for a time. But it's not as scandalous. Think of a scent a moody art student who doesn't want to come off as girly would wear. Maybe she's the one drawing the hot priests. Pepper and all the woods are there so I'm happy. It's got a creamy touch (not as creamy as Tam Dao) as it dries down, so I hope it doesn't give me the Encre Noire headache. (You'd think that with how many times I've mentioned Tam Dao I'd just give in and buy it already.)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="1999264"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=1999264#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1998984" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1998984" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="EuniceMine"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1498756"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1498756.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="EuniceMine" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Ard-Al-Zaafaran/Ameerat-Al-Ehsaas-70365.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.70365.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Ameerat Al Ehsaas "title="Ameerat Al Ehsaas "></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1998984ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1998984" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1498756">EuniceMine</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-11">12/11/23 21:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Despus de usarlo varios das puedo decir q me encanta, pero no dura mucho, 2 o 3 horas tops .Es increble como un grupo de personas pueden oler una fragancia pero no obtener el mismo resultado. Las personas que dicen q huele a mostaza? O a vinagre? De donde sacan eso? Este perfume huele rico, no es dulce, no es atalcado, como los perfumes de mujer usualmente son, con. Un montn de flores y vainilla. A fragancia me projecta a mi a ese olor que desprende una rama de un rbol fresco (pino) recin cortado, fresco, a madera. Con un toque de masculinidad pero no lo suficiente para decir que es fragancia solo para hombre. Es un olor totalmente diferente a lo que estamos acostumbrados y es de esperarse que no les agrade a todos. Buen da</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="1998984"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=1998984#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1997233" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1987456" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="StarryDawn"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1610540"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1610540.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="StarryDawn" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Victoria-s-Secret/Bare-Vanilla-56836.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.56836.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bare Vanilla"title="Bare Vanilla"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1987456ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1987456" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1610540">StarryDawn</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-28">11/28/23 12:28</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Have a sample I got today, very woodsy but not overwhelming, linear but very nice.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="1987456"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=1987456#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1986905" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1986905" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="cl195238"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1875315"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1875315.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="cl195238" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1986905ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1986905" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1875315">cl195238</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-27">11/27/23 20:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This smells to me like walking through a Christmas tree lot with some palo santo burning somewhere in the distance. Very woody, unisex, and niche. That said, I saw someone say it smells like a hardware store, and in a way I can't necessarily disagree with that either.<br />
<br />
On paper it's nothing amazing- sharper and more peppery than on my skin. I dont usually go for unisex scents, but this one smells so good on my skin chemistry that I want a full bottle. It lasts 8ish hours on me. <br />
<br />
ETA: Now that I've got my bottle (it's heavier and looks better in-person than expected!), I love layering this to add woodiness to fruit-dominant scents; with cherry, apple or pear frags it gives the impression of smelling the entire fruit tree, with blackberry it's very "Pacific Northwest forest". It also does well with vanillas. Love this.<br />
<br />
Second edit: My husband (who tends to dislike most fragrances and usually doesn't wear any) likes to borrow this one from me and now wears it often too. May it never be discontinued!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="1986905"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=1986905#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1986467" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1986467" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="morganmorris"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1408576"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1408576.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="morganmorris" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1986467ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1986467" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1408576">morganmorris</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-27">11/27/23 08:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This smells like Christmas season at the mall in the 90s. I love it. The longevity isn't great. I don't mind reapplying as it's pretty linear and I don't need to wait for the dry down.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="1986467"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=1986467#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1986070" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1986070" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="OG_Stewie8564"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1872442"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1872442.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="OG_Stewie8564" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Neroli-Portofino-12192.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.12192.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Neroli Portofino"title="Neroli Portofino"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1986070ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1986070" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1872442">OG_Stewie8564</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-26">11/26/23 19:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Great bottle and scent! If you're looking for Tom Ford's bne Fum on a budget, this fragrance is for you! It's a great price for a scent present with ebony and palo santo with a slight layer of vanilla which fits into the fall and winter seasons. I find this to be more of a masculine scent that anyone could wear. Overall, 9/10 </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="1986070"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=1986070#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1985833" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1985833" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="disneyninja01"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1651201"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1651201.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="disneyninja01" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.76532.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Eilish No 2"title="Eilish No 2"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1985833ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1985833" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1651201">disneyninja01</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-26">11/26/23 13:05</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I had to try this fragrance in-store several times before finally warming up to it.  I think my nose had to develop a bit, honestly (I am still new to perfumery).  I disliked both the original and No. 2 until recently when they both "made sense" to me and I bought both in a small dabber size. <br />
This is late autumn to me.  When the trees have lost most of their leaves and the deep cold begins to settle in.  It makes me think of rainy, cloudy fall days.  To my nose, it is pretty similar to Ebony Wood by Zara.  If you like that fragrance but want something a touch sweeter, definitely give Eilish No. 2 a go.  This is such good quality and so interesting for a celebrity scent.  It breaks the mold for me and on initial spray reminds me of the vibe that many Penhaligon's fragrances offer (am I giving Eilish No. 2 too much credit?  Maybe.).  Bergamot, apple blossom, pepper, and the palo santo really shine at the beginning.  These notes are giving the more masculine feel to the fragrance.  I really get the ebony wood and vanilla strongest after the first fifteen to thirty minutes of wear.  Strangely enough, when the fragrance has dried down to mostly a skin scent (after 3-4 hours) I pick up on the vanilla, woodsy notes, and a light powdery fruitiness that might be coming from the apple blossom. <br />
Overall, I find this fragrance interesting, classy, and unisex.  It's strong enough to command attention and to add an element of mystery or suprise to an outfit but not so strong that it is overpowering.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="1985833"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=1985833#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1985567" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1985454" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="sennie"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1901378"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1901378.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="sennie" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1985454ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1985454" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1901378">sennie</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-26">11/26/23 00:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>shouldn't be a blind buy<br />
smells unisex, but i can tell how it may come off as moreso feminine or masculine to others<br />
very mature, and all of its notes are apparent; heavy, strong muskiness of floral citruses, and fresh soil<br />
yes, it does smell like dirt -- but very clean, and earthy<br />
would be better used in colder weathers and in later times of day</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="1985454"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=1985454#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1983621" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1874663">Deliza1997</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-23">11/23/23 13:44</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is too masculine to my nose and it doesn't end here.  I would have given it a pass for me if the drydown was nice. I will not even like it to smell it on a man or anyone.The drydown on my skin is muddy and dirty kinda nasty. I don't want to smell like jungle and puddle. The performance is great though but it's a big no for me. <br />
Also If  some people are not into this fragrance it doesnt mean they only love childish sugary fragrances lol.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="1983621"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=1983621#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1983457" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1983457" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Takamojo"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1868288"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1868288.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Takamojo" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mancera/Tonka-Cola-76893.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.76893.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Tonka Cola"title="Tonka Cola"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1983457ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1983457" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1868288">Takamojo</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-23">11/23/23 10:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I really enjoy this fragrance. The funny thing about No. 2 is that to me it smells very feminine and mature, but to other ladies I've asked they said it's mature masculine. <br />
Honestly, it's a scent that if you like it, you'll love to continously smell yourself. It's really in your face (the wearer) and  the Palo Santo is the star of the show. It's loud and confident. Depending on the occasion, it may be a good thing cause it will grab attention.<br />
I really dont get the vanilla in the drydown sadly.<br />
<br />
My personal critique is that I wish this was a bit heavier and had some sweetness in the background. To my nose, I couldn't imagine this in the hot season. I think this is strictly  cold season (like you can see your breath type cold)<br />
The bottles are definitely a nice collectors piece, so think twice before selling it off.<br />
<br />
*Not a safe blind buy. Definitely test it on skin from your initial spray until the drydown to see if you like it. <br />
Edit:  If you're a box store shopper (Ulta, Macy's, Belk, Sephora ect.) Buy this with your reward points or at a discount store. The retail can be on the higher side depending on where you purchase it<br />
<br />
Scent: 5/10<br />
Performance: 7/10<br />
Value: 7/10<br />
Overall: 19/30</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="1983457"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=1983457#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1982813" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1982813" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="notaperfumesnob"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1798252"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="notaperfumesnob" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1982813ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1982813" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1798252">notaperfumesnob</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-22">11/22/23 13:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Although i'm a gourmand lover, the first Billie Eilish is super sugary-sweet even if i do say so myself. So, i was expecting a similar vibe for number 2...<br />
<br />
How surprised i was when i first tried this! It has masculine vibes but is still so elegant and the perfect unisex scent. When i first spray on the skin i get a bergamot bomb (which i love), but it quickly dries down to an elegant deep, woody vanilla with just a trail of bergamot for freshness. <br />
<br />
I truly love it! The only issue i have is the lasting power - i get about two hours.<br />
<br />
This fragrace reminds me exactly of a Penhaligon's fragrance, but i can't put my finger on which one. I don't have any Penhaligon's to test it against, but it's definitely very very similar to one i tested in the scent library last year.<br />
<br />
Does anyone else get Penhaligon's vibes? If so, which one?</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="1982813"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=1982813#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1981464" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1981464" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Faedriel"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1581363"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1581363.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Faedriel" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.70052.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Eilish"title="Eilish"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1981464ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1981464" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.87); If yes, buy this, the end.<br />
<br />
I love the way this smells. I love the way this smells on clothes especially. Is it strong? Yeah. Masculine? A little but not enough for that to be the main whining point. Sorry youve only smelled immature bottles of synthetic sugar.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="1981464"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=1981464#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1980654" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I think this easily could be a niche fragrance but a lot more affordable.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="1980654"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=1980654#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1980573" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1980573" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Fragnant"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1423550"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1423550.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Fragnant" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1980573ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1980573" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.85);
