Sjp stash is a lot smoother throughout if youre looking for a similar dry down.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="1980573"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=1980573#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1979734" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1979734" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Scent.guide"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1406103"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1406103.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Scent.guide" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1979734ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1979734" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1406103">Scent.guide</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-18">11/18/23 15:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Fresh pen shavings and cardamom with creamy nuances and a bit of citrusy/fruity freshness. Base here is quite sweet but still mostly woody. Unexpectedly its a very complex niche smelling fragrance. Lovely!<br />
I have miniature and its the most hideous bottle in my collection :))<br />
<br />
Follow me on IG: scent.guide</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="1979734"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=1979734#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1973690" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1973690" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Sweet Satine"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1573872"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1573872.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Sweet Satine" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lancome/Idole-Nectar-74137.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.74137.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Idle Nectar"title="Idle Nectar"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1973690ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1973690" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1573872">Sweet Satine</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-10">11/10/23 17:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>All I smell is pickles, I have no idea why I pick up this note. Is it the black pepper? I would not recommend this perfume as a blind buy. Basil yuk</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="1973690"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=1973690#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1972650" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1972650" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Bomber81"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1036736"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1036736.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Bomber81" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/XOXO/Kundalini-12486.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.12486.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Kundalini"title="Kundalini"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1972650ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1972650" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1036736">Bomber81</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-09">11/09/23 12:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I LOVE this. Can't stop spraying it. Not only because I'm in absolute love with this Palo Santo note, but because it doesn't last long past the initial blast. <br />
<br />
I so wish this lasted longer. I'd wear it all day, every day. Typically I think most perfume can be worn all year, any time day or night.. up to the wearer. This however gives me really strong cool weather vibes - fall and winter... and night time. Not sure what it is, maybe because it reminds me so much of a camp fire, which I absolutely adore and is one of my all time favourite pass times to get the head right. For this reason, this is a night time scent for me, though I'll wear it whenever I damn well please.<br />
<br />
I personally love the bottle and think it's a piece of art. It's gun metal grey, solid, heavy and sturdy. This is not a cheap design. It sprays perfectly and the whole thing just feels like quality to me. Except the longevity of the scent.<br />
<br />
I'm not picking up on any "pickle" note, nor anything metallic as others have mentioned. Pretty sure people are misreading the description of the bottle itself and somehow manifesting a "metal" note in their minds. There is no metal note. The bottle itself is metallic. The juice is pure smoke and woods, some bergamot and pepper on top, with the slightest floral note that is barely noticeable if you didn't know it were there. The Palo Santo is the star of this show and I'm loving it. Just wish it lasted longer. <br />
<br />
The ad shows Eilish writhing and moaning in a puddle under the rain and/or a waterfall of sorts. This doesn't evoke any correlation to the actual scent to me at all, which seems like false advertising in a way, but whatever floats her boat.<br />
<br />
Been pairing it with vintage white linen to keep it clean/fresh and CK Woman to enhance and make it last longer when I'm going out because I'm not carrying #2 in my purse - this art piece is not lightweight. I just love the scent and hope she comes out with another that is more intense and lasts longer. I picked mine up at a pawn shop for super duper cheap, so I'll just keep spraying away with abandon. and hope i find a smaller bottle somewhere so i can wear this out and keep it present. <br />
<br />
I'd say this is not a safe blind buy unless you love smoky wood scent. To me, this is one of the greatest and the only one of its kind in my collection.<br />
<br />
It is absolutely unisex to me, the same way campfire smell is to your jacket. Any age. Any sex.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="1972650"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=1972650#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1972118" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1972118" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="auditoryComedian"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1495896"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1495896.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="auditoryComedian" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.70052.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Eilish"title="Eilish"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1972118ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1972118" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1495896">auditoryComedian</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-08">11/08/23 19:28</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>To me, at least so far, it smells like a Christmas tree. I really like that but it makes me wonder how Eilish No. 3 will be like considering that it actually lists "fresh fir needle" as a note. I'm ready for the new release so I have all three of the bottle - even better if I like the third one too. <br />
<br />
What's weird is that I HATED both of the fragrances the first time I sniffed them when they first came out. Now I love them. Not sure what changed!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="1972118"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=1972118#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1970866" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1970866" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="FilipeD"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1781169"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1781169.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="FilipeD" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Ombre-Leather-2018-50239.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.50239.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Ombr Leather (2018)"title="Ombr Leather (2018)"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1970866ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1970866" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1781169">FilipeD</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-07">11/07/23 08:53</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Delicious "celebrity fragrance" offering that has the olfactory profile of Tom Ford's Bois Marocain, or Myrrhe Mystre.<br />
For those who don't want to pay $300 and get a designer fragrance that costs more than niche houses -, and with the bonus of actually having a sillage instead of a skin scent - as well as lasting longer than a couple of hours. <br />
Unisex perfume for those who want an earthy boise, with a slightly sweet floral opening. <br />
I bought the 100 ml package and would buy 250 ml if it was available. It's a no brainer.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="1970866"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=1970866#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1969277" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1969277" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ayamail26"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1503613"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1503613.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ayamail26" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1969277ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1969277" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1503613">ayamail26</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-05">11/05/23 10:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This to me smells like a pine tree for some reason, almost like the air wick Christmas pine air freshener</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="1969277"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=1969277#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1969260" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1969260" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Delrey2002"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1838871"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1838871.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Delrey2002" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Michael-Kors/Midnight-Shimmer-38989.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.38989.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Midnight Shimmer"title="Midnight Shimmer"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1969260ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1969260" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1838871">Delrey2002</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-05">11/05/23 10:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It's definitely not a woman's fragrance, more like unisex , leaning on the masculine side. To me it smells like sandalwood, although I don't see any note of it in here.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="1969260"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=1969260#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1966757" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1966757" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Maya lilac"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1705079"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1705079.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Maya lilac" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1966757ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1966757" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1705079">Maya lilac</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-02">11/02/23 08:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Billie Eilish 2 is a unique scent. I am not saying that there is nothing out on the market that smells similar but I have not tested anything similar yet! Surprising fact, especially for a celebrity scent, this is interesting and different. A far departure from the sickening sweet, fruity, artificial smelling celebrity creations. <br />
<br />
Its a wonderful woody, slightly spicy, slightly aromatic, slightly floral, with a sweet vanilla base. Smooth, cozy, unique smelling to me! <br />
<br />
Performance is not outstanding but neither is the price. Is quite an inexpensive fragrance with moderate performance and an ugly bottle. I like interesting packaging and all of that, but this body sculpture shape is quite odd to me.<br />
<br />
If I can get past it, I might get a bottle of this. I find it really suitable for fall, rainy days wear. I think palo santo is such a beautiful note, very little explored in the industry, and honestly Billie Eilish 2 smells really mesmerising to me. Very unexpected, but I trully love this celebrity scent!!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="1966757"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=1966757#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1965824" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1965824" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Photojenchick"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/134113"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.134113.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Photojenchick" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Ellis-Brooklyn/Salt-60584.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.60584.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Salt"title="Salt"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1965824ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1965824" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/134113">Photojenchick</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-01">11/01/23 06:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Bought this one last spring. Sprayed once, thought "meh", &amp; it sat on a shelf until today. It's now autumn, first day below freezing in South Carolina. Narrowed down SOTD to my beloved SJP Stash, BDK Gris Charnel, or Eilish No. 2.  At least for today, I prefer Eilish over the other two. Stash works better on me in humid, warmer months. Fig/vetiver combo in Gris Charnel sometimes pulls too sour. Eilish No. 2 is perfect on a cold, windy day. It's cozy, incensey, stays present but never overwhelming. Love layering it with something sweet like Mugler Angel Muse or Heretic Dirty Vanilla. Will purchase back up bottle soon in the largest size. Judging by mixed reviews, this will probably be discontinued sooner than later. :/</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="1965824"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=1965824#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1963602" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1963602" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="audreyg"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1266687"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1266687.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="audreyg" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Delina-Exclusif-50370.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.50370.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Delina Exclusif"title="Delina Exclusif"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1963602ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1963602" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1266687">audreyg</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-29">10/29/23 10:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The papyrus and palo santo definitely come through here and there's a hint of the florals as well. Not sure if it's just my preferences or skin chemistry but I absolutely adore this fragrance and it's my go-to when I'm not sure what to wear. Can definitely be dressed down or up and despite the woodiness/pepper it smells clean and a bit sweet to me. It's almost like it's primarily a peppery wood fragrance with the DNA of the first in the background; that synthetic vanilla comes through and balances things perfectly. My friend got it for me as they did the first Billie Eilish fragrance and I do love both but I definitely prefer this to the first since it's just more my style. Would say it's not a safe blind buy based on all the other reviews but if you like woody and spicy scents I'd go for it!<br />
<br />
Edit: I actually think this is like a lighter, less complex version of TF Ebene Fume. Billie Eilish v.2 has a very similar woodiness (it's definitely the palo santo) with a synthetic sweetness in place of the rose. I have recently LOVED Ebene Fume and I believe it's partly because it feels like an upgraded version of Billie Eilish v.2 which I've worn off and on since it came out. I like to wear the Eilish for everyday and more subtle occasions and save Ebene Fume for when I really feel it. Would recommend both!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="1963602"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=1963602#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1962386" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1962386" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="tessture"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2719"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2719.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="tessture" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/I-Profumi-di-Firenze/Acqua-Mirabile-Odorosa-di-Firenze-9765.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.9765.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Acqua Mirabile Odorosa di Firenze "title="Acqua Mirabile Odorosa di Firenze "></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1962386ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1962386" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2719">tessture</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-27">10/27/23 13:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Masculine, oud-y, strong spiky wood in the modern screamy horrible burning way.  This starts out on my skin as hairspray chemicals and dries rapidly to rubbing alcohol and burnt hair. Awful mess. Not sure where the listed notes are. Even after scrubbing, Im getting a glue-like hairspray lacqure scent with the sharp alcohol bite. SO glad I didnt buy this. I wanted the bottle to go next to the gold Eilish #1, which I like a lot, but I might wait for an empty to come up cheap on ebay and buy it that way. Coz argh argh argh.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="1962386"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=1962386#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1960035" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1960035" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Pinkmeat"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1842369"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1842369.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Pinkmeat" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/M-Micallef/Spiritual-51035.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.51035.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Spiritual"title="Spiritual"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1960035ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1960035" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1842369">Pinkmeat</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-24">10/24/23 18:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Originally got this for my self wasnt as peppery as I had hoped for. Its got a faint peppery scent but not fresh pepper its woody as stated. But I just wasnt feeling it on my skin. I didnt enjoy it. I gave it to my partner along with the original eilish. I think it smells much better coming off of her. So Id say this is going to depend on your skin type and if the fragrance wants to cooperate. lol. Me couldnt stand it. On her I enjoy it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="1960035"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=1960035#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1957467" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1957467" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Qx.susie"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1842406"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1842406.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Qx.susie" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mugler/Alien-Essence-Absolue-15452.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.15452.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Alien Essence Absolue"title="Alien Essence Absolue"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1957467ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1957467" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1842406">Qx.susie</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-21">10/21/23 08:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>While I applaud the designers for taking a huge risk, I can't in all honesty say that this was a good one. <br />
<br />
I'm all for being innovative and different, but the fragrance needs to be well done and imo this is not.<br />
<br />
 It's harsh, abrasive, sharp, overly masculine (for a fragrance that's supposed to be unisex) the blend of notes don't seem to have a rhyme of reason which results in a fragrance that seems confused and best. <br />
<br />
It reads almost like they were trying so hard to be different, that they built the composition based on shock value instead of what would actually blend well together. <br />
<br />
I would never add this to my collection because I do not prefer to smell like a bushy, peppery piece of rotten wood, and it doesn't work for my skin, but I recognize some people love that profile. <br />
<br />
I'm just confused from a business standpoint, where the logic was to create a composition so opposite from the one that garnered your original consumer base in the first place <br />
<br />
CHEERS!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="1957467"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=1957467#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1956603" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; So peppery and woody. This smells like an elder's fragrance.<br />
<br />
I can't believe how different from her first fragrance this is. REVOLTING</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="1956603"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=1956603#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1956275" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1956275" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="vivthai"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1515750"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="vivthai" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1956275ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1956275" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1515750">vivthai</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-19">10/19/23 17:05</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is like Burberry Her Elixir's older brother that's masculine, spicier, cologne-like, and absent of strawberry. They share this very bright wood scent that I find addicting to sniff (Her Elixir cloaks the wood in fruity notes and Ellish No 2 cloaks it in spicy notes). The scent takes me straight to standing next to a guy outside of the club during the fall (where you can see each other's breath lol).</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="1956275"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=1956275#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1955797" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1955797" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Hey.its.allie.24"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1663055"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1663055.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Hey.its.allie.24" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Hypnotic-Poison-Eau-de-Parfum-23098.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.23098.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Hypnotic Poison Eau de Parfum"title="Hypnotic Poison Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1955797ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1955797" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1663055">Hey.its.allie.24</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-19">10/19/23 05:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It smells identical to VS bare vanilla decadent</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="1955797"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=1955797#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1951857" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1951857" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="TLight"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/941641"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.941641.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="TLight" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lattafa-Perfumes/Raghba-Wood-Intense-28713.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.28713.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Raghba Wood Intense"title="Raghba Wood Intense"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1951857ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1951857" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/941641">TLight</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-14">10/14/23 12:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Ive been on the hunt for a woody, smokey, dark, incensey, unisex fragrance for days. This hits. Perfect for colder months, I love everything about it except I wish it packed a heavier punch. I have TF bne Fum, and I get the comparisons, but its not as Smokey on initial spray. I wanted to see what others thought so I scoured YouTube for video reviews. Unsurprisingly, everyone who loved Eilish is balking at this release. I find that to be fantastic! I dont want to smell like all these juvenile vanilla worshiping, cotton candy devotees. I want to smell like the Palo Santo burning, winter cabin dwelling, under the moon dancing, mysterious maiden of the woods. If thats your vibe- its a safe blind buy.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="1951857"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=1951857#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1950953" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1950953" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="jdb_"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1843724"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1843724.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="jdb_" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1950953ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1950953" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1843724">jdb_</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-13">10/13/23 09:56</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>So TBH I bought this, sold it, and bought it again because I missed it! I initially let it go because I felt the need to layer it for softer edges or a bit of sweetness. However, Ive realized she can stand well on her own. I personally love androgynous forestry fragrances like this. Kind of smells like a jacket the day after camping and laying on the piney ground by a fire. The bergamot and pepper give some sharpness and light to this otherwise very deep scent. I cant seem to detect any florals or vanilla, but this blend is probably the reason it strays away from a basic masculine cologne.  I do understand the SJP Stash comparison but not because the fragrances are interchangeable, more so that they can hold a similar spot in your collection. Stash works better in a dry climate though, and I think this will wear best on cold, dreary days. With a little mist in the air. Day or night, shes a sexy, earthy mood. I do wish longevity was better, because its an addicting scent I want to keep huffing. <br />
<br />
BTW you gotta love palo santo for this one!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="1950953"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=1950953#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1950860" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1950860" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="cowboygenesis"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1706276"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1706276.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="cowboygenesis" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lolita-Lempicka/LolitaLand-51385.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.51385.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="LolitaLand"title="LolitaLand"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1950860ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1950860" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1706276">cowboygenesis</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-13">10/13/23 08:06</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>if you liked the first rendition of this series, you might be confused by this one. it's a complete night and day scent-wise, considering eilish no. 2 has a truly unisex appeal with its combination of black pepper and palo santo, the former note being particularly strong here. personally, i loved this one and disliked the first. 2 is a lot more mature, less cloying, fresh yet homely; it's sexy in its modesty. im not usually a fan of celebrity fragrances, but this one got my attention and kept it!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="1950860"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=1950860#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1949157" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1949157" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Charlottesumxs"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1465385"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1465385.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Charlottesumxs" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Kylie-Minogue/Disco-Darling-77471.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.77471.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Disco Darling"title="Disco Darling"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1949157ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1949157" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1465385">Charlottesumxs</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-11">10/11/23 06:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>After loving Eilish #1, I wasn't so sure of this, so I only bought the 10ml bottle. While it has grown on me, mostly I enjoy #2 as a layering scent. It really shines over the sweetness of #1, but I also love it over the crisp, clean floral of Elizabeth and James' Nirvana White. It adds depth and a kind of spiciness to light and feminine fragrances, so I enjoy having it, but the lack of longevity is enough to put me off buying a larger bottle.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="1949157"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=1949157#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1946765" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1946765" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="princelebii"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1066446"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1066446.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="princelebii" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Elizabeth-Arden/Red-Door-25-Eau-de-Parfum-27514.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.27514.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Red Door 25 Eau de Parfum"title="Red Door 25 Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1946765ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1946765" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1066446">princelebii</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-07">10/07/23 20:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Not everyone will be pleasant on this scent. It is deep, dark, lustrous and heady for hot climate in Thailand. This is very much like Valentino UoMo EDP/EDT in my opinion. However, the bottle is sexy , I am obsessed with it! Art piece!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="1946765"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=1946765#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1945683" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1945683" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MrsGerrie"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1777904"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1777904.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="MrsGerrie" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1945683ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1945683" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1777904">MrsGerrie</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-06">10/06/23 12:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This one tics almost all my boxes. Badass, somehow sweet and really interesting or better said.... mysterious. It took me a few days to get to know and understand the scent but it really is amazing. This could very well be a niche parfum. Surely not a blind buy but certainly worth to get to know it and maybe, just like me, you fall in love with it.<br />
<br />
The only downside is that it doesn't stay long on the skin. 4 hours tops. But for that price a respray won't hurt.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="1945683"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=1945683#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1944947" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Very cologne on me and the projection is crazy strong. Not a bad thing but Im prefer a more close to skin perfume with minimal projection.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="1944947"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=1944947#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1944070" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1944070" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Cinderfoot"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1685000"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1685000.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Cinderfoot" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Marc-Jacobs/Dot-14781.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.14781.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Dot"title="Dot"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1944070ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1944070" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1685000">Cinderfoot</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-04">10/04/23 12:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>At first spray I get a sweet woody scent.. I picture a hot assassin prowling in the woods.  But just seconds later on my skin, Elish #2 dries down to a cheap musky scent, turning my assassin into an old granny browsing the isles of a department store  she passes me by and I get an instant migraine.<br />
Im very disappointed with this one.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="1944070"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=1944070#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1942391" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1942391" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Snoopy68"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1842407"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Snoopy68" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1942391ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1942391" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1842407">Snoopy68</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-02">10/02/23 08:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Oh boy, do I love this perfume. This young celeb Billie Eilish sure out performed herself with this very niche perfume that strikes well above its pay grade. I get Autumnal/Winter vibes from this. It reminds me of a foggy and mossy pine forest (think Germanys Black Forest), right down to a fairytale witch living in a wooden cabin. A sharp but subtle incense flavor. People say it smells masculine. I dont get male vibes at all. Musk, fog, moss, with a deliciously slightly sweet blend of Italian bergamot. Its dark, sultry, and witchy. I absolutely love this perfume and its quickly become my favorite.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="1942391"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=1942391#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1940353" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
