align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="1940353"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=1940353#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1935275" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1935275" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Kot1"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1772019"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Kot1" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1825.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Tobacco Vanille"title="Tobacco Vanille"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1935275ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1935275" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1772019">Kot1</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-23">09/23/23 06:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Adding a second review,<br />
<br />
It really gives me oud wood when you spray it</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="1935275"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=1935275#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1930836" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1930836" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="miss_aly"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1382225"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1382225.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="miss_aly" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.70052.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Eilish"title="Eilish"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1930836ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1930836" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1382225">miss_aly</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-18">09/18/23 06:07</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I'm shook by some of the negative reviews on this! It's interesting because for the original Eilish perfume, I was unimpressed and thought it was a basic warm vanilla/amber sent. But then I wore it more and fell in love with it. I think this one is the same way for me! At first it smells like a combo of By The Fireplace and Jazz Club by Replica. It's not necessarily an earth-shattering unique frag, but it's a gorgeous unisex woody scent! As I wear it more, it grows on me. It's surprisingly long lasting, great for the fall and winter season! I want to experiment with layering it. I think this would be a DREAM if I mix it with either Milk by Commodity or Vanilla Woods by 7 Virtues.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="1930836"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=1930836#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1929359" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1929359" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="SaraKa"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1484320"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1484320.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="SaraKa" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Clinique/Aromatics-in-White-28532.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.28532.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Aromatics in White"title="Aromatics in White"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1929359ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1929359" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1484320">SaraKa</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-16">09/16/23 08:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Dry, woody and kinda sweet. Not my type of scent but I wish it was since the bottle is so cool</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="1929359"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=1929359#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1929279" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1929279" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ultimate.bliss"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1585068"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1585068.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ultimate.bliss" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Rabanne/Pure-XS-For-Her-51424.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.51424.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Pure XS For Her"title="Pure XS For Her"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1929279ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1929279" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1585068">ultimate.bliss</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-16">09/16/23 06:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I didn't expect myself to like this, but I am a risk taker and a Billie Eilish fan, so I blind ordered the 100 ml bottle. I love the Eilish no. 1 more than anything, in my opinion, that is how heaven smells like. Eilish no. 2 couldn't be more different, but eventually I fell in love with this one too. It's definietly not feminine, this one is very masculine and dark. The opening smells like dill to  me, which scared me a lot, because I cannot stand dill, but then it settles into very woody fragrance. I smell booze somewhere in this, which gives it a fun kick. <br />
<br />
I wear this perfume when I am wearing dark and feminine clothes, to give it a contrast and a mysterious twist. Only thing I am unhappy with is the longevity, definietly doesn't last for the whole day, stays about three to four hours before needing to reapply. If it could stay longer, it would be literally a masterpiece.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="1929279"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=1929279#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1923816" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Does not share any similarities with the No. 1, which was disappointing since I love that one. Smells good but too masculine leaning for me. Id rather smell this on a man.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="1923816"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=1923816#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1922414" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1922414" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Bernyrox"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1833369"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Bernyrox" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1922414ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1922414" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1833369">Bernyrox</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-07">09/07/23 19:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I swing between niche and out of the box cheapies like Stash. Discovered Eilish 2 on this site desperately seeking Stash (I have since emailed SJP USA and sadly confirm it is discontinued). Seeing this as an alternative I decided to give it a go. Perfumes react pretty differently on my skin, which tends to eat perfume. This is a fab buy if it works for you - like many have said, runs way above its own pay grade. This is super warm on my skin and I didnt get any of those cooler notes. Having owned Terroni - I am definitely getting touches, and touches of Tom Ford Oud Wood - on dry down this does go a little generic and a little more mascbut for the price its a winner. PS tried #1 while I was there and it is so sweet, so cakey, so synthetic - not for me - but def give #2 a try, as others have said leans very toward niche for a celeb perfume</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="1922414"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=1922414#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1917772" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1917772" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Tony Balkan"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1029609"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1029609.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Tony Balkan" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Rochas/Moustache-Original-1949-52351.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.52351.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Moustache Original 1949"title="Moustache Original 1949"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1917772ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1917772" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.72);
