It's unrelated to the original, no choco, no girly or feminine vibe whatsoever. A dark woody balsamic unisex masculine leaning fragrance. Tomboy rebel metalhead girls who don't like girly feminine fragrances might enjoy it though.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="1917772"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=1917772#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1917575" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1917575" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="aguila9"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1177632"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1177632.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="aguila9" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Royal-79159.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.79159.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="1 Million Royal"title="1 Million Royal"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1917575ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1917575" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1177632">aguila9</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-01">09/01/23 23:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I find bne Fum by Tom Ford simply amazing. And this, wow. Everything si love about bne, with less smoke which now makes it appropriate for any setting.  <br />
<br />
Spayed my self and retested bne Fum, smelling it 24 hours later on my clothes its 80-85% same.  Which makes it an amazing stand-in.<br />
<br />
Less projection but lasts 6-8 hours solid <br />
Over 12 on clothes.  About half Ebenes lifespan <br />
<br />
I am male. And yes this is male leaning</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="1917575"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=1917575#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1916543" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1916543" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="KatanaBluebird"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1455328"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1455328.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="KatanaBluebird" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Martin-Margiela/Matcha-Meditation-64805.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.64805.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Matcha Meditation"title="Matcha Meditation"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1916543ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1916543" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1455328">KatanaBluebird</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-31">08/31/23 17:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Crushed pine needles.  Wood smoke.  Cold, snowy days.  <br />
<br />
Someone said it smelled like a Christmas tree lot.  I agree.  It can be quite sharp at first, so I guess that's where the metallic note comes in.  To some, this can be harsh.  But I love me some cold, snowy, sub zero scents.<br />
<br />
You want the warmth of the house?  No, this is cold like the garage.  When you slam shut the car door after driving in the snow, it's late, you got the tree, but you get that whiff of tree, pine, clear cold air.  This is like when you go to the hardware store and they cut the lumber for you.  <br />
<br />
But I like that raw smell.  And you can mix it with No 1 for some vanilla baking and get some of that warmth back.  I look forward to layering this.<br />
<br />
This isnt for everyone but I like this a lot.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="1916543"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=1916543#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1913383" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1913383" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="hijoebye"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1323365"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1323365.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="hijoebye" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1913383ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1913383" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1323365">hijoebye</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-28">08/28/23 06:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Immediately off the bat this is a woody fragrance, to my nose I get a lot of pine needles, black pepper, and a smokiness that recalls frankencense or myrrh. Definitely a cold weather fragrance, I can see this being worn around the holidays. I must say, for a celebrity fragrance this is unexpected, well blended, unique and totally niche in its composition. I prefer it to the original Eilish. I still don't understand the bottle design, it's awkward to remove the top and spray a bottle of breasts. Also never seemed aligned with Billie Eilish's persona.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="1913383"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=1913383#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1911353" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1911353" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="iuliagabriela"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1153701"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1153701.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="iuliagabriela" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mugler/Angel-Fantasm-91916.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.91916.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Angel Fantasm"title="Angel Fantasm"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1911353ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1911353" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1153701">iuliagabriela</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-25">08/25/23 13:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a very pleasant unisex woody perfume, nothing groundbreaking but still quite likeable. It's moderately spicy and has that classic creamy sandalwood note lots of people know and love. I only sprayed it once in the store, so this is a first impression, but it reminded me a lot of the Adam Levine perfume, the one supposedly similar to Tom Ford Santal Blanc. I'll probably test it again, because I really want to add that beautiful bottle to my collection!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="1911353"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=1911353#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1911234" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1911234" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="deeshla57"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1810622"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="deeshla57" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Memo-Paris/Inverness-83482.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.83482.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Inverness"title="Inverness"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1911234ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1911234" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1810622">deeshla57</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-25">08/25/23 11:06</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Dang it. This is one of those fragrances that I LOVED the first time I spray a tester on my wrist and walked around Ulta sniffing and enjoying my own little scent-cloud. Once the initial blast of bergamot died down and the palo santo came to the fore I started to feel nauseated. This is a reminder of how I can love a scent like palo santo as a candle, incense, natural environment smell but NOT love it on my skin. I've tried for a few days and get that same journey from love-to-nausea. This is one I need to re-sell or gift.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="1911234"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=1911234#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1910216" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1910216" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Velvetta"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1701017"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1701017.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Velvetta" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Xerjoff/Bouquet-Ideale-11800.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.11800.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bouquet Ideale"title="Bouquet Ideale"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1910216ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1910216" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1701017">Velvetta</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-24">08/24/23 05:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It is not a safe blind buy for fans of sweet, gourmandy and floral feminine scents and definitely a unisex. <br />
It definitely has pretty unique notes for a celebrity scent and for it's price range. I like it a lot, for me smells woody, earthy and a bit fresh/wet. I don't get any sweetness, I think it could be a niche honestly. I have a lot of sweet, easy-going mainstream fragrances and since some time I was craving something different. I have been gaining interest in niche fragrances too lately and this was a nice budget option. Of course, it is not as complex as other fragrances, doesn't evolve much on me over time, it's more linear but it is really pleasant. It's interesting and different. <br />
My boyfriend usually prefers more sweet, boozy or natural-smelling perfumes says it's a sexy scent and I agree with him. I didn't have opportunity to test the longevity and projection well yet, because of hot weather in Germany this month, but I would not be bothered to pull the bottle out during the day to spray more. I prefer buying smaller bottles, so I can be sure that I'm actually going to use whole bottle. <br />
I have seen so many negative or straight up silly reviews of this perfumes bottle on this site and I'm actually surprised. I think the bottle is really pretty and elegant, I don't think it is vulgar at all and I'm pretty conservative for my age when it comes to these things (at my ripe age of 25). I usually keep my fragrances closed in my closet, but this one I like to put on a pile of books as a decoration in my room. <br />
To keep it short at the end: I'm really excited to use this scent on cold, gloomy Autumn days to get the same atmosphere as on the beautiful Photoshoot Billie had <br />
for the it's Promo and it's great for people who are currently on a budget and want to start exploring and experimenting with different scents just like I do now. It has unpopular in mainstream female marketed scents notes but it's still a newbie-friendly and not overpriced. <br />
Ah and I'm not really even a Billie Eilish fan honestly, but I think she is talented, but apparently also got interesting taste in scents. Can't wait to see more from her in the future. Some people on this site should really chill down.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="1910216"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=1910216#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1909102" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1909102" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="qianqian"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1778971"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1778971.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="qianqian" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/L-Artisan-Parfumeur/Fou-d-Absinthe-4441.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.4441.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Fou d'Absinthe"title="Fou d'Absinthe"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1909102ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1909102" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1778971">qianqian</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-22">08/22/23 22:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Sold in Australia by Priceline exclusively, for now, by Aug 2023. 79 AUD for 30ml and 109 AUD for 100ml. Imo it's very similar to Tom Ford's Oud Wood. Perhaps less sillage but you get BE2 for only 1/5 of the price of TF. It's a good enough woody smoky scent for me. Unisex, leaning towards masculine, but definitely goes well with business smart outfits for office days. I'll grab a bottle next month.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="1909102"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=1909102#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1903516" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1903516" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Charmedbymeghan"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1736880"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Charmedbymeghan" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1903516ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1903516" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1736880">Charmedbymeghan</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-16">08/16/23 08:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a Unisex fragrance.  But if you are a female looking at this, I suggest that you enjoy a slightly sweetened woody fragrance.  If you own and love ZARA Ebony Wood - there's a 98% chance that you will also love this.  Not dupes, similar vibes though, but this one is creamier. <br />
<br />
I am 38 yr old female and absolutely adore this fragrance.  I get complimented and asked by both men &amp; women what I am wearing.  It projects nicely without being abnoxious.  And lasts about 5-8 hours on me.  <br />
<br />
This is for those who want an easy-reach unique fragrance.  Great for Autumn.  Not like her first fragrance at all, this is better IMO.  Smells niche.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="1903516"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=1903516#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1902740" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1902740" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="toriiyorii"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1763681"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1763681.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="toriiyorii" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/MAC/Turquatic-13030.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.13030.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Turquatic"title="Turquatic"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1902740ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1902740" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1763681">toriiyorii</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-15">08/15/23 08:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I bought this as a blind buy because i loved Eilish #1. I should've read the notes as I would've immediately made a different choice. This is a very masculine scent, which i usually love (especially the musk's and woods), but something about this fragrance rubs my nose the completely wrong way. Its a pass for me and I'm glad I didn't buy the full bottle. I would NOT recommend this for a blind buy.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="1902740"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=1902740#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1901520" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1901520" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Atypicalist"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1725336"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1725336.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Atypicalist" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1901520ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1901520" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1725336">Atypicalist</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-13">08/13/23 18:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Tried this at Sephora. To my nose, it does smell similar to Tom Ford Tobacco Oud, which is one of my all time favourite for a fraction of the price.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="1901520"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=1901520#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1900959" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1900959" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="JackieM"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/243981"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.243981.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="JackieM" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Bath-Body-Works/Autumn-Drive-77332.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.77332.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Autumn Drive"title="Autumn Drive"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1900959ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1900959" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/243981">JackieM</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-13">08/13/23 01:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The moment you smell this, you'll probably feel like you've smelled it before. It's so very close to other existing perfumes, but a huge improvement over Eilish 1.<br />
<br />
Totally agree with hippiechick and CCClydes: this is way more Oud Wood than Ebene Fume. But if you don't like those, you will have a really hard time with this. If you do, this is a fraction of the cost. I doubt anyone will mistake this for Santal 33 offhand.<br />
<br />
And I personally like these slightly nightmarish bottles. Love any combination of feminine and minimal, natural forms and abstract.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="1900959"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=1900959#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="76532" sentiment="all"></reviews-infinity>
            </div>
</div>
</div><div class="tabs-panel" id="popular-positive-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>Most Popular Positive Reviews</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
                            <div id="parent1658033" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1658033" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="menmen"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1385135"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1385135.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="menmen" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1658033ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck9x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1658033" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1385135">menmen</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-10-03">10/03/22 09:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Has anyone even tried this? Why does it have so many bad reviews already?</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="1658033"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=1658033#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1696691" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1696691" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="misskelseytm"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1617724"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1617724.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="misskelseytm" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/DefineMe-Creative-Studio/Barbie-83825.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.83825.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Barbie"title="Barbie"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1696691ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1696691" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1617724">misskelseytm</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-11-26">11/26/22 15:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Im a huge Billie Eilish fan, so I ordered both of her fragrances as soon as they came out. While I do love the original Eilish, it can be a bit heady and cloyingly sweet at times, and I even got a complaint once from a scent-sensitive person saying it was overwhelming for her. <br />
<br />
But Eilish No. 2 is much more sophisticated, complex and grounded. The main three notes I keep getting are pine, palo santo and incense. It gives me Christmas tree lot and ooh, somebody in the neighborhood has their fireplace going vibes. Its perfect timing for the release, since this will make for a perfect winter scent. Today is my first day wearing it so I cant say much yet for silage or longevity, but as far as the fragrance itself, Im hooked. I look forward to pairing it with the original Eilish as well, because I think the two together might bring out the best in each other.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="1696691"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=1696691#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1951857" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1951857" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="TLight"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/941641"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.941641.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="TLight" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lattafa-Perfumes/Raghba-Wood-Intense-28713.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.28713.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Raghba Wood Intense"title="Raghba Wood Intense"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1951857ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1951857" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/941641">TLight</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-14">10/14/23 12:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Ive been on the hunt for a woody, smokey, dark, incensey, unisex fragrance for days. This hits. Perfect for colder months, I love everything about it except I wish it packed a heavier punch. I have TF bne Fum, and I get the comparisons, but its not as Smokey on initial spray. I wanted to see what others thought so I scoured YouTube for video reviews. Unsurprisingly, everyone who loved Eilish is balking at this release. I find that to be fantastic! I dont want to smell like all these juvenile vanilla worshiping, cotton candy devotees. I want to smell like the Palo Santo burning, winter cabin dwelling, under the moon dancing, mysterious maiden of the woods. If thats your vibe- its a safe blind buy.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="1951857"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=1951857#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1916543" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1916543" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="KatanaBluebird"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1455328"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1455328.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="KatanaBluebird" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Martin-Margiela/Matcha-Meditation-64805.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.64805.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Matcha Meditation"title="Matcha Meditation"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1916543ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1916543" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1455328">KatanaBluebird</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-31">08/31/23 17:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Crushed pine needles.  Wood smoke.  Cold, snowy days.  <br />
<br />
Someone said it smelled like a Christmas tree lot.  I agree.  It can be quite sharp at first, so I guess that's where the metallic note comes in.  To some, this can be harsh.  But I love me some cold, snowy, sub zero scents.<br />
<br />
You want the warmth of the house?  No, this is cold like the garage.  When you slam shut the car door after driving in the snow, it's late, you got the tree, but you get that whiff of tree, pine, clear cold air.  This is like when you go to the hardware store and they cut the lumber for you.  <br />
<br />
But I like that raw smell.  And you can mix it with No 1 for some vanilla baking and get some of that warmth back.  I look forward to layering this.<br />
<br />
This isnt for everyone but I like this a lot.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="1916543"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=1916543#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1820350" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1820350" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Atomikbomb_"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1211792"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1211792.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="Atomikbomb_" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1820350ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1820350" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1211792">Atomikbomb_</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-04-28">04/28/23 19:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I don't follow Billie, I'm not really that into her music (I've listened to a handful of times thanks to Beat Saber), but from what I've seen, she's presented herself in wildly different *forms* or styles. It's unsurprising to me that this would be entirely different from the first fragrance, which is very sweet and vanillic. <br />
<br />
Ultimately I think this leans masculine (who cares though, wear what you like regardless). The wood in this is actually VERY interesting though, and I would never have guessed this was a celebrity fragrance. So...if you're snobby about celeb perfumes, or know people who are...just wear this and see how impressively rich and aromatic it is! <br />
<br />
As with other pepper-forward fragrances, I disliked the opening of this. It's biting, and although it has some bergamot, it doesn't really help cut the pepperiness of it all. You just need to wait until it settles the heck down. <br />
<br />
After it does though, its really, really good. I'd absolutely love this on my husband! It smells like it contains something planty like galbanum, but overall these woods with the enduring peppercorn help it to smell very dry, and somewhat middle-eastern actually. Only the slightest amount of vanilla is present, but you need to press your nose up close to it to detect it.<br />
<br />
I honestly don't know what papyrus smells like, but this resembles Santal 33 a little, and I get wafts of a pickle note. However...it's minimal and much less so than S33, and I'm not sure most people would even be left with the same impression. This has a lot more going on, it's deep, and somewhat dark in tone. Yet, it's never *heavy* in weight (that's hard to explain), and it doesn't sit like a fog of perfume on one's person. <br />
<br />
I'm really happy I tested this. I'd reach for this occasionally, but I don't feel the pull to own it. Still, I'm quite impressed and think that the nerve and idea behind a release like this is really commendable. It's not going to be for everyone, but it'll *really* be perfect for a few people. <br />
<br />
Very cool </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="1820350"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=1820350#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="76532" sentiment="positive"></reviews-infinity>
            </div>
</div>
</div><div class="tabs-panel" id="popular-negative-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>Most Popular Negative Reviews</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
                            <div id="parent1724425" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1724425" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Millimichelle"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1476942"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1476942.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Millimichelle" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1724425ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1724425" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1476942">Millimichelle</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-01-03">01/03/23 17:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I love the first Billie fragrance so I had high hopes for this especially after hearing her description. This is straight up dill/pickle for me. Im so disappointed, and bummed. I hope they take returns.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="1724425"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=1724425#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1704529" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1704529" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="rosiekposie"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1561557"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1561557.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="rosiekposie" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1704529ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1704529" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1561557">rosiekposie</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-12-07">12/07/22 22:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I think I overestimated how much I would hate this. I went into it expecting it to be vile, but it isn't. I would even say it's as decent as "ok."<br />
I definitely don't like it for a personal fragrance for myself, and I feel like if I was around almost anyone else with it on, I wouldn't care for it on them either. But I could imagine a very special person having their skin chemistry be just right to work well with this.<br />
<br />
It is for sure a masculine scent. It smells like a men's cologne or after shave. There are very few "manly" smells that I really like. This is not one of them.<br />
<br />
The first Eilish perfume has the scent note "spices" (my nose picks that up as GINGER (a smell that repulses me)) and although it isn't listed for No. 2, I feel like I can still smell it in this one.<br />
<br />
There is also a note of what I'm guessing is the poppy, but to me it smells like it's in the same family of the smell that some ants smell like when you smush them. Like take that ant smell, and dial it down an octave or two and that's what this mystery note is to me.<br />
<br />
This is a really hard to describe scent. But the main take away would be "masculine cologne that I don't like."<br />
<br />
Definitely don't think I'll be keeping this one but I bought it for fun to try and didn't plan on liking it anyway and because I love the bottle and thought it would look good next to the original gold one.<br />
<br />
Also my mom said there's notes in it that smell like dirty armpits to her. I didnt quite get that myself but I can totally see what she's talking about. It's a very earthy, spicy scent that could easily be a men's deodorant scent that maybe isn't so fresh.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="1704529"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=1704529#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1983621" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1983621" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Deliza1997"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1874663"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1874663.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Deliza1997" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Side-Effect-42260.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.42260.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Side Effect"title="Side Effect"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1983621ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1983621" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1874663">Deliza1997</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-23">11/23/23 13:44</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is too masculine to my nose and it doesn't end here.  I would have given it a pass for me if the drydown was nice. I will not even like it to smell it on a man or anyone.The drydown on my skin is muddy and dirty kinda nasty. I don't want to smell like jungle and puddle. The performance is great though but it's a big no for me. <br />
Also If  some people are not into this fragrance it doesnt mean they only love childish sugary fragrances lol.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="1983621"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=1983621#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1711002" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1711002" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MCW7"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1441650"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1441650.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="MCW7" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mugler/Aura-Mugler-45639.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.45639.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Aura Mugler"title="Aura Mugler"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1711002ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1711002" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1441650">MCW7</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-12-16">12/16/22 21:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>All I get out of this is a major oud smell. Even  though there is no oud listed. A very brief burst of Apple..   it is masculine. Does not  feel to me like this would be a unisex vibe. as it leans more towards a male fragrance imo.  . ..  I dont smell any pine, anything. like Christmas as described from her. do not blind by this one! It is not a sweet fragrance.  like her first one. I love her first one . If  youre comfortable with middle eastern fragrances you might like this .. being serious here.. to me, its kind of a fail. I dont love it. in all honesty, its kind of awful .  . As far as silage, I dont know yet, as I just received it yesterday.. not really sure if I want anyone to smell this on me . Im going to try it out. will only appeal to certain people. Definitely not a main stream fragrance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76532"comment_id="1711002"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html?ccid=1711002#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1839861" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1839861" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="vanillash"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1731529"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="vanillash" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mugler/Alien-Goddess-68354.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.68354.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Alien Goddess "title="Alien Goddess "></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1839861ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1839861" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.71);         <span style="white-space: nowrap; color: lightsteelblue">55.&nbsp;</span>
        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 1; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">
            <a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/designers/Frederic-Malle.html" class="en2inter">Frederic Malle</a>
        </span>
    </div>
            </div>
        <div class="cell small-4 medium-2 flex-container flex-dir-column">
            <div style="display: flex; align-items: start; text-align: start; line-height: 1.2em; height: 1.7em; overflow: hidden;">
        <span style="white-space: nowrap; color: lightsteelblue">56.&nbsp;</span>
        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 1; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">
            <a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/designers/Montblanc.html" class="en2inter">Montblanc</a>
        </span>
    </div>
            <div style="display: flex; align-items: start; text-align: start; line-height: 1.2em; height: 1.7em; overflow: hidden;">
        <span style="white-space: nowrap; color: lightsteelblue">57.&nbsp;</span>
        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 1; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">
            <a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/designers/Le-Labo.html" class="en2inter">Le Labo</a>
        </span>
    </div>
            <div style="display: flex; align-items: start; text-align: start; line-height: 1.2em; height: 1.7em; overflow: hidden;">
        <span style="white-space: nowrap; color: lightsteelblue">58.&nbsp;</span>
        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 1; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">
            <a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/designers/Zoologist-Perfumes.html" class="en2inter">Zoologist Perfumes</a>
        </span>
    </div>
            <div style="display: flex; align-items: start; text-align: start; line-height: 1.2em; height: 1.7em; overflow: hidden;">
        <span style="white-space: nowrap; color: lightsteelblue">59.&nbsp;</span>
        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 1; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">

                if (lang == 'EN') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.com") });
                if (lang == 'DE') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.de").replace(/designers/, "Designer").replace(/perfume/, "Parfum") });
                if (lang == 'ES') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.es").replace(/designers/, "disenador") });
                if (lang == 'FR') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.fr").replace(/designers/, "designer").replace(/perfume/, "parfum") });
                if (lang == 'CS') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.cz").replace(/designers/, "designer") });
                if (lang == 'IT') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.it").replace(/designers/, "designer") });
                if (lang == 'RU') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.ru") });
                if (lang == 'PL') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.pl").replace(/designers/, "marki").replace(/perfume/, "perfumy") });
                if (lang == 'PT') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.com.br").replace(/designers/, "desenhista") });
                if (lang == 'EL') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.gr").replace(/designers/, "designer") });
                if (lang == 'ZH') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.asia").replace(/designers/, "designer") });
                if (lang == 'NL') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.nl").replace(/designers/, "ontwerper").replace(/perfume/, "parfum") });
                if (lang == 'SR') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.punmiris.com").replace(/designers/, "dizajner").replace(/perfume/, "parfem") });
                if (lang == 'RO') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.ro").replace(/designers/, "creatori").replace(/perfume/, "parfum") });
                if (lang == 'AR') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragranticarabia.com").replace(/perfume/, "perfumes") });
                if (lang == 'UK') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.ua").replace(/perfume/, "perfumes") });
                if (lang == 'MN') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.mn").replace(/perfume/, "perfumes") });
                if (lang == 'HE') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.co.il").replace(/perfume/, "perfumes") });
            });
</script>


<script  data-cfasync="false">
    // Check that service workers are supported
    if ('serviceWorker' in navigator) {
        // Use the window load event to keep the page load performant
        window.addEventListener('load', () => {
            navigator.serviceWorker.register('/service-worker.js?v=rtgFr7c4b6b084f801d1036ebe90095780be1');
        });
    }
</script>
<script>
    $(document).ready(function () {
        $('#fragranticaloader').fadeOut(20);
    });
</script>
</body>
</html>
